lg.l: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā |
yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na peyā brahmavādibhiḥ || iti |

div.p: etadapi brahmavādiśabdasya tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukāritvanimittatvāpravacanāśrayaṇena brūñ‌vadatyorekārthatvātprabrūyādbrahmaṇastveṣāmiti niyamādyasyaiva pravacanaṃ sa eva tacchīlastaddharmastatsādhukārī vā bhavati tasmādbrahmaṇā eva brahmavādinaḥ | tathā ca madyasāmānyapratiṣedhāṅganindārthavāde 'bhihitam |

tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati yathaivaikānnasurā trayāṇāmapyapeyā tathā sarvā brahmavādibhirapeyeti | itarathā yathaivaiketi ca brahmavādibhiriti cobhayamapyanarthakameva syāt | ślokāntaranirdeśenaiva varṇatrayasaṃbandhalābhāt | tenobhau madhvāsavakṣībāvityaviruddham | tathā cānyārthadarśanamabhyanujñānavacanam “yanmālyamāsīttatpaścātparyauhata surā vai mālyaṃ tato rājanyamasajata tasmājjyāyāṃśca snuṣā ca śvaśuraśca surāṃ pītvā vilapantaścā ' 'sate pāpmā vai mālyaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibetpāpmanā na saṃsṛjyā iti tadetadetatkṣatriyo brāhmaṇaṃ brūyānnainaṃ surā pītā hinasti ya evaṃ vidvānsurāṃ pibati” iti | madhusīdhuvivakṣayaitat | yattu mātuladuhitṛpariṇayanaṃ tayostanmātṛṣvasrīyādisaṃbandhavyavadhāne 'pi bhrātrādivyavahārādaviruddham | yadyapi vāsudevasvaseti subhadrā khyātā tathā 'pyutpattau baladevavāsudevayorekānaṃśāyāśca nijatvānvākhyānānmātṛṣvasrīyā subhadrā tasya mātṛpitṛṣvasrīyā duhitā veti pariṇayanābhyanujñānādvijñāyate |
yena hyanyatraivamuktam—

lg.l: sa yatpramāṇaṃ kurute lokastadanu vartate || iti |

div.p: sa kathaṃ sarvalokādarśabhūtaḥ san viruddhācāraṃ pravartayiṣyati | etena rukmiṇīpariṇayanaṃ vyākhyātam | yattvadyatanānāmāhicchatrakamāthurabrāhmaṇīnāṃ surāpānādi dākṣiṇātyānāṃ mātuladuhitṛvivāhādi smṛtiviruddhamupanyastam | tatra kecittāvadāhuḥ | smṛtyācārayoritaretaranirapekṣavedamūlatvena tulyabalatvādvihitapratiṣiddhavikalpānuṣṭhānāśrayaṇādadoṣa iti | tattu vakṣyamāṇabalābalavibhāgādayuktam | anye tvevamāhuḥ—
tathā manunā 'pyuktam—

lg.l: yenāsya pitaro yātā yena yātāḥ pitāmahāḥ |
tena yāyātsatāṃ mārgaṃ tena gacchanna duṣyati ||

div.p: yeṣāṃ tu yaḥ pitrādibhirevārtho nā ' 'caritaḥ smṛtyantarapratiṣiddhaśca te taṃ pariharantyeva | apariharanto vā svajanādibhiḥ parihriyante | nanu gautamenā ' 'mnāyaviruddhānāmācārāṇāmaprāmāṇyamuktam | āha—

na tvetadapi yuktaṃ smṛtigranthe 'pyāmnāyaśabdaprayogāt | smārtadharmādhikāre hi śaṅkhalikhitābhyāmuktam ‘āmnāyaḥ smṛtidhārakaḥ’ iti | granthakāragatāyāḥ smṛtestatkṛtagranthāmnāyaḥ smṛtigranthādhyāyināṃ smṛtidhāraṇārthatvenoktaḥ | tataśca manvādivākyapratiṣiddhācārāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamaśakyamabhyupagantum | āpastambavacanaṃ tu baudhāyanena smṛtiviruddhaduṣṭācārodāharaṇānyeva prayacchatā nirākṛtam | spaṣṭakāmādihetvantaradarśanānna viruddhācārāṇāmāpastambavacanasya vā śrutimūlatvopapattiḥ | āha | kena vā brāhmaṇīnāṃ surāpānaṃ pratiṣiddham |
ucyate—

lg.l: tasmādbrāhmaṇarājanyau vaiśyaśca na surāṃ pibet || ityanena |

div.p: ucyate—

ekaikasyā eva hi brāhmaṇavyakteryathāprasaktavadhapānayoḥ pratiṣedhāt | vivakṣyamāṇamapi tāvadanūdyamānatvādannakriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ vā saṃbhavati kimuta yadā jātigataikatvānuvāda evāyaṃ vijñāyate | āha | hananapratiṣedhe karmabhūtasya brāhmaṇasyoddiśyamānatvātsurāpāne ca kartṛtvenopādīyamānatvātsvargakāmaudumbarīsamānārthayajamānavattulyavivakṣāvivakṣayoraprasaṅgādudāharaṇavaiṣamyam | tathā hi—

pratiṣedhavidhiparo hi vidhāyakaḥ śuddhavadhapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavādbrāhmaṇajātimātraviśiṣṭavadhapratiṣedhaṃ vidhāya nivṛttavyāpāro yadi liṅgamaparaṃ brāhmaṇe vadhe pratiṣedhaṃ vā vidadhyāttataḥ pratyayāvṛttilakṣaṇavākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ | yeṣāṃ tu vidhipratiṣedhau nāmātyantabhinnau vedavākyārthau teṣāṃ pratyayasaṃbandhānugṛhītaśaktirabhāvamātrābhidhānādabhyadhikalabdhavyāpāro nañ‌vidhyarthamapi dveṣādyarthaprāptaṃ pūrvoktanyāyavivakṣitabrāhmaṇaviśiṣṭahananāviśiṣṭaṃ cānūditaṃ pratiṣidhya caritārtho na liṅgamaparaṃ brāhmaṇavadhavidhiṣu śaknotyanāvartamānaḥ pratiṣeddhumiti śrūyamāṇamapi liṅgapratiṣedhaṃ pratyanupayujyamānatvādavivakṣitaṃ bhavati | eṣā hyatra vacanavyaktiryat, krodhādivaśena brāhmaṇaṃ hanyādbrāhmaṇo vā hantavyastanneti | vidhyekatvapakṣe punarīdṛśī vākyayojanā yad brāhmaṇahananaṃ tanna kuryāditi yo vā brāhmaṇastaṃ na hanyāditi brāhmaṇaviśiṣṭahananapratiṣedhavidhiḥ śuddhoddiṣṭabrāhmaṇaviṣayavadhapratiṣedhavidhirveti |

brāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet, na peyā brahmavādibhiriti nimittadeśakālaphalasaṃskāryānupādeyapañcakavyatirekādekatrā ' 'khyātapratyayopāttaguṇībhūtopādīyamānasaṃkhyāparicchedyatvayogyasādhanāṃśaviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāditaratra ca tṛtīyāvibhaktiśrutivacanaṃ vivakṣitaliṅgasyaiva pratiṣedhakamiti darśayitavyam |
yadi hi brāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ pibedityayamavāntaravākyārthaḥ prākpratiṣedhasaṃbandhādvidhibuddhimavasthāpayettato guṇatvopādeyatvavidhisamavāyānna brāhmaṇapade kiṃcidavivakṣitaṃ nāma syāt |

tenehāpi yatsurāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ pibettanneti vā vacanaṃ vyajyate yo brāhmaṇaḥ sa na surāṃ pibediti vā surāviśiṣṭapānapratiṣedhena pratiṣedhavidhinā vā pratyavāyavyāvṛttyā brāhmaṇo 'nugṛhyata iti nāsya pānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vā pratividheyatvopapattiḥ |
na ca yo brāhmaṇaḥ pibedityanūditaṃ sa ca pumāniti vidhivyāpārādvinā liṅgavivakṣā 'vakalpate |

tataścobhayatrāpyavivakṣitaliṅgasaṃkhyatvaṃ siddham | nanvevaṃ sati brāhmaṇastrīvadhe 'pi puṃbrāhmaṇavadhavadbrahmahatyā 'stīti yadātreyyāmeva kevalāyāṃ bhrūṇahatyāprāyaścittavidhānaṃ tannopapadyate |
ucyate—

na ca prāyaścittālpatvena nimittasya brahmahatyātvamapanīyate puṃvadhe 'pi laghutaraprāyaścittavidhidarśanena brahmahatyādoṣābhāvaprasaṅgāttasmānna vācanikaprāyaścittālpatvena brāhmaṇīvadhapratiṣedha eva nāstītyāśaṅkitavyam | surāpāne punaḥ prāyaścittaviśeṣo 'pi na kaścidāmnāta iti dūrādapākṛtatvādastyevāsya smṛtyā saha virodhaḥ | yā 'pi cā ' 'pastambasmṛtivacanāttulyabalatvāśaṅkā bhavetsā 'pi “tasmādbāhmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibati” ityetena pratyakṣaśrutividhinā nirākṛteti naivaṃvidhācāraprāmāṇyamāśaṅkitavyam |
athavā sadācārapramāṇatvapratipādanārthaṃ sūtradvayenāpyetadekamadhikaraṇaṃ vyākhyātavyam | iha yāvanti kṛṣṇamṛgasaṃcaraṇopalakṣitāryāvartanivāsicāturvarṇyācaraṇāni tānyudāhṛtya cintyate—

lg.l: kiṃ tathaiva pramāṇaṃ tadatha vā niṣpramāṇakam || iti |

div.p: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ |
ucyate—

nanu ca smṛtikārairevaitatprāmāṇyamabhyupagataṃ “tadvidāṃ ca smṛtiśīle” “ācāraścaiva sādhūnāṃ” “yasmindeśe ya ācāraḥ sa sadācāra ucyate” | ataśca tatprāmāṇyādeva siddham | na | mūlābhāvāhetudarśanātirekāt | śākhāntaragatavedavākyadarśanamūlāni hi smaraṇopanibandhanāni pramāṇatvenādhigatāni | nanu sadācāradarśanāttanmūlamātrapravṛttasmaraṇānāṃ mūlāntarānumānasaṃbhavaḥ |

lg.l: yathaiva ca vayaṃ teṣāṃ draṣṭāraḥ kevalaṃ tathā |

div.p: yadi hi tairmūlānyaśroṣyanta tato yathaivānyāni smaraṇāni nibaddhāni tathaivaitānyapi nibaddhānyevābhaviṣyanyatastu svayamupalabdhānurūpamanibadhya parapratyayenaiva sadācārāḥ pramāṇamityāhuḥ | ato na dṛṣṭamūlatvenādhyavasātuṃ śakyamiti vicāryate | tatra pūrvādhikaraṇa dvayabalena prāmāṇyaṃ pratijñāyate kartṛsāmānyādvidhismṛtivirodharahitatvācca |
tadapākurvannāha—

śāstraparimeyatvaṃ tāvatparimāṇaśabdavācyaṃ dharmādharmayoravasthitaṃ parimitāni ca śāstrāṇi vedopavedādīni na ca teṣāṃ madhye sadācāraśāstraṃ kiṃcidasti | na ca sadācāraḥ svayameva śāstraṃ nāpi taddarśanamanuṣṭhānaṃ vā 'tyantaparāyattatvātprameyatvācca | smṛtestvetadviṣayāyā nirmūlatvamuktameva |
na tāvaddeśajātikulabhedādbhinnānāmaparimitasvarūpāṇāmekaśrutimūlatvam |

yāvadācāraṃ hi vedavākyāni kalpayatāṃ veda evaikaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ | ekasya tu vākyasya naiva kasyacidaparimitācāravidhāyitvamavakalpate yata ācārāḥ pravartteran | na ca dharmasūtrakāraistadeva dṛṣṭavā ' 'cāraprāmāṇyamupanibaddham | śeṣadharmasmṛtivākyatulyanibandhanaprasaṅgāt | na cā ' 'cāradarśanottarakālapravṛttā smṛtisteṣāṃ mūlaṃ bhavati | mūlamūlibalābalaviparyayaprasaṅgāt |
śiṣṭācāraḥ pramāṇamiti hi śrutāvanumīyamānāyāmācāraḥ prathamaṃ siddho bhavettatpūrvikā śrutiḥ |

lg.l: na tvācārasya sā mūlamiti nirmūlatā punaḥ |

div.p: śāstraparimāṇatvāditi vā parimite hyarthe śāstraṃ pravartteta | aparimitatvādācārāṇāmucchāstratvamiti | parimitārthaviṣayatvādvā śāstrasya, ‘aprāpte śāstramarthavat’jai. sū. ( 6 | 2 | 4 ) iti |

lg.l: vaiśyānāṃ sevakānāṃ vā vaidyānāṃ nagareṣu vā |

div.p: yadvā sūtratrayeṇāpyetadevādhikaraṇaṃ vyākhyātavyam | ihā ' 'ryāvartanivāsiśiṣṭācārānevodāhṛtya pūrvavatprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyasaṃdehe śiṣṭākope 'viruddhamiti siddhāntastāvadupakramyate | tathā hi—
teṣvadarśanādvirodhasyetyevagupakramaṃ vā sūtram | śabdārthaviṣayaprayogaśiṣṭācāravipratipattau saṃdehaḥ |
yavavarāhavetasaśabdāḥ priyaṅguvāyasajambūṣvapi kila kvāpi deśāntare prayujyante |

lg.l: yatra deśe hi yaḥ śabdo yasminnarthe prayujyate |
naikeṣāmeva sā hyasti keṣāṃcidvā na vidyate ||

div.p: tathā coktaṃ śavatirgatikarmā kambojeṣveva dṛṣṭo vikārāpannamāryāḥ prayuñjate śavamiti mṛtaśarīrābhidhānādityādi | vahava eva hi dhātavo nāmaśabdāśca pratideśamarthabhedeṣu vyavasthitā dṛśyante tasmātsameyamabhidhāne vipratipattiḥ syāt | evaṃ ca vikṛtiṣu keṣāṃ cidarthānāṃ sādhāraṇaśabdavācyatvātprakṛtāvivāvikṛtaprayogādārṣaṃ codako 'nugrahīṣyate | ‘teṣvadarśanādvirodhasya’ ityatraiva caitadvyākhyeyam | itaratra vipratipattyavirodhayoraghaṭamānatvāt | tasmādācāravipratipatteḥ samatvādvikalpa iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate || 8 ||

lg.l: teṣāṃ ta eva śabdānāmarthā mukhyā hi netare ||

div.p: yavamatībhiradbhiraudumbaryāḥ prokṣaṇe vidhīyamāne vākyaśeṣo 'yaṃ ‘yatrānyā oṣadhayo mlāyante 'thaite modamānāstiṣṭhanti’ iti bahvīṣu śākhāsu śrūyate bhāṣyakāreṇa vāruṇaprāghāsikayavamayakarambhapātravākyaśeṣatvenopalabdho yaḥ sa mandaprayojanatvāttathā nāmāstu |
evaṃ varāhavetasaśabdā api śāstrasthaprayogādeva niścīyante |

div.head: ( bhāṣyakāroktodāharaṇādyākṣepaḥ )
div.p: natvetānyudāharaṇāni lokaprasiddhereva vyavasthitatvādyuktāni | tathā hi |

lg.l: jambūṃ na vetasaṃ prāhurvarāhaṃ nāpi vāyasam ||
adhyāropya vicāreṇa kiṃ mudhā khidyate manaḥ |

div.p:
yadyapi tatrābhidheyasaṃdehamanudāhṛtyopādānasaṃdehanirṇayopāyavyākhyānaṃ kariṣyati | yāva
dvākyaśeṣameva sa nirṇayo nānyatra | ayaṃ tvamidheyanirṇaya ekatra ca kṛtaḥ sarvatra ca kṛta eva bhaviṣyatītyevamapunaruktatvamāpadyate |
tatsiddhisūtre ca sārūpyādīnāṃ gauṇavṛttinimittānāmanukramaṇādvetasasadṛśajambūpratyayasiddhiraśabdārthatve 'pi vijñāyata eveti nehodāhṛtena kāryam |

div.head: ( āryamlecchaprayogavipratipattibalābalacintanam | )

lg.l: tatra kiṃ tulyatā yuktā kimekaiva balīyasī |

div.p: sarvo hi śabdo 'rthapratyāyanārthaṃ prayujyate | arthaśca saṃvyavahāraprasiddhayarthamabhidhīyate |
iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate | śāstrasthā veti pūrvavadeva sakalasūtravyākhyā yojanīyā | kiṃ ca |

śabdāpabhraṃśavadeva gauṇabhrāntyādiprayoganimittā arthāpabhraṃśā bhavanti te śāstrasthairevā
viplutārthakriyānimittapuṇyārthibhiḥ śakyante sādhvasādhukārṣāpaṇamadhyādivatatparīkṣibhirvivektum | abhiyuktānabhiyuktajñānayoścābhiyuktajñānaṃ balavaditarasya sulabhāpavādatvāt |
etenā ' 'rthāvartanivāsimadhye 'pi—

lg.l: te te yatra prayuñjīran sa so 'rthastattvato bhavet ||

div.head: ( smṛtyācāravirodhe balābalavicintanam | )

lg.l: smṛtīnāṃ vā balīyastvaṃ śāstrāsthā veti varṇyate ||

div.p: tadyathā 'gniprakaraṇe ‘yatsaptadaśavatīmupadadhātyannamevobhayato dadhāti tasmādubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ parigṛhya puruṣo 'nnamatti’ iti | satyapi hetuvannigadatve prasiddhirahite hetvasaṃbhavāt | vidhāyiṣyate tu vede vacanenetyanena nyāyena vidhyanumānam | na caitanniyogato 'rthataḥ prāptaṃ yena ‘tasmātprajā daśa māsāṃngarbhaṃ dhṛtvā ekādaśamanu prajāyante tasmādaśvataryaḥ prajā’ itivat svabhāvaprāptatvenārthaprāptatvena vā ‘tasmāduttare vayasi putrānpitopajīvati’ itivadanūdyetetyato nyāyātpuruṣadharmavidhiḥ | evam ‘annameva taddakṣiṇato dadhāti tasmāddakṣiṇena hastena puruṣo 'nnamatti’ iti | tathā dīkṣito nayanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ prathamamaṅkte savyaṃ hi manuṣyāḥ pūrvamañjate bidhṛtyai’ iti | tathā yūpaikādaśinyāṃ ‘dve dve raśane yūpamṛcchataḥ tasmātstriyaḥ puṃso 'tiriktāstasmādutaiko bahrīrjāyā vindate naikā bahūn patīn’ iti | tathā darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe 'gnīṣomīyavidhisaṃbandhalaṅghanena tvāṣṭravadhanimittendragatabrahmahatyāturīyavibhāgapratigrahaprastāvāgatarajasvalāvratānāṃ bhūmiśayanāstrānāmāṃsabhakṣaṇānabhya, ṅgānañjanāvilekhanākartanādantadhāvanānasvacchedanārajjusaṃsarjanādīnāṃ trirātraviṣayāṇāṃ prakaraṇātiriktastrīdharmatvāvadhāraṇam |
tasmādācārebhyaḥ smṛtirbalīyasī sannibandhaneti |

div.head: (lokavākyaśeṣayorvirodhe balābalacintanam |)
div.p: trivṛdbahiṣpavamānamityuktvā tṛcatrayamanukrāntamiti stotrīyarṅnavakavacana eva tribṛcchabdo vijñāyate |

lg.l: yājñikānāṃ ca vede ca prasiddhastvodanaṃ prati ||

div.p: anavastrāvitāntarūṣmapakvaudanavacano hi yājñikānāṃ caruśabdaḥ prasiddhastathā vede 'pi ‘ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ payasi caruḥ’ iti vihite paścāduktamaditimodanenetivacanāccaudanavacanatvaṃ jñātam | evamāśvavālaḥ prastara ityaśvajātīyavālamayaḥ prastaro lokaprasiddhayā vijñāyate | vaidikavākyaśeṣāttu kāśeṣvaśvavālaprasiddhiḥ | evaṃ hi śrūyate “yajño vai devebhyo 'śvo bhūtvā 'pākrāmatso 'paḥ prāviśat | sa vāladhau gṛhītaḥ sa vālānmuktvā viveśa ha | te vālāḥ kāśatāṃ prāptāḥ” kāryo 'taḥ prastarastu taiḥ |

lg.l: aikṣavyau vidhṛtī ye ca te ikṣvavayavātmike |
loke siddhe tathā vede kāśānāmeva mūlake ||

div.p: nanu ca lokaprasiddherdharmaṃ pratyanaṅgatvādvedaprasiddhireva jyāyasī ||

lg.l: naitadevaṃ padārtheṣu na hi vedo viśiṣyate |

div.p: vedanirapekṣā hi lokaprasiddhirātmānaṃ labhate vaidikī punarlokaprasiddhapadāntarasāmānādhikaraṇyena sidhyet |

lg.l: tatra lokāviruddhā yā vaidikī saiva gṛhyate |

div.p: ‘teṣvadarśanādvirodhasya’ iti ca teṣu laukikeṣu padārtheṣvadarśanādvirodhasyārthavādānāṃ cānyaparatvena guṇavādaprāyatvāt | ādityayūpayajanamānaprastarasvargāhavanīyādivacanavatkathamapi prarocanāśeṣatvāt saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhakaraṇavyutpādanavyāpārarahitatvācca na padārthapratipattyaṅgatvamadhyavasīyate tadāśrayaṇe ca vidhivirodhaprasaṅgāteṣveva vā darśanādvirodhasyetyabhiprāyaḥ | tathā śāstrasthamanvādiprasiddhirapyasmatpakṣānuguṇaiva | yathā ' 'ha—

lg.l: kārpāsamupavītaṃ syādviprasyordhvavṛtaṃ trivṛt‘śaṇasūtramayaṃ rājño vaiśyasyā ' 'vikameva ca’ ityuttarārdham | manu. 2 a. ślo. 44 | |
trivṛtā granthinaikenetimuñjālābhe tu kartavyāḥ kuśāśmantakabalvajaiḥ | trivṛtā granthinaikena tribhiḥ pañcabhireva vā manu. a. 2 ślo. 43 | ||

div.p: tasmātsamā 'pi tāvadbhatviti prāpte 'bhidhīyate—

lg.l: gauṇo vā yadi vā mukhyo vedenā ' 'śrīyate hi yaḥ |

div.p: tena yatra trivṛdagniṣṭoma iti śrūyate tatra tenaivārthena bhavitavyam | evaṃ stomaśabdo yadyapi brāhmaṇastoma ityādiṣu samudāyamātravacanatvenaprasiddhastathā 'pi ‘trivṛdeva stomo bhavati pañcadaśa stomo bhavati’ iti vede śravaṇāt stuteśca mānaṃ stoma iti yājñikasmaraṇāttathā stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyartha iti vyākaraṇaśāstraprasiddheravaśyameva trivṛdādiṣu lokaprasiddhiratikramaṇīyā | yattu manuvacanaṃ tadubhayāśrayatvāt samatvenāpi yujyate | yadvā tatrāpi navatantukameva trivṛcchabdātpratyeṣyate tathā raśanātrivṛttvamapīti | yadvā yathaivāyaṃ navake dṛṣṭastathā 'yaṃ stotrīyāgate 'pīti yatraiva tatsaṃbhavastatraiva tatprasiddhayanupātī bhavati | yatra tu saṃkhyeyāntaraviṣayatvaṃ tatra vaidiko 'rtho gauṇo gṛhyatāṃ laukiko vā mukhya iti tādṛśe viṣaye mukhyārthatvāllokikaprasiddhireva grahītavyetyuttarasūtre vakṣyāmaḥ | “coditaṃ tu pratīyetāvirodhāt” iti tathā caruśabdo 'pyanyāyyānekārthābhidhānapratibaddhaśaktitvādekatra niyamyamāno yājñikavedaprasiddhibhyāmodanaviṣaya eva bhavati | āśvavālaikṣavīśabdau tu yadi tāvadvaidikaprayogalabdhasamudāyaprasiddhitvena laukikīmavayavaprasiddhiṃ jahītastataḥ siddhameva śāstrasthapratipattibalīyastvam | athāpi śyenajātyupamitaprasiddhaśyenayāge gauṇatvadvārā vā ' 'ptaprasiddhiḥ ‘samānāmitaracchayenena’ ityādiṣvivā ' 'śrīyate | tathā 'pi śāstrakalpitatvāddharmaṃ prati balīyastvam |

lg.l: svatantrasya hi vedasya dṛṣṭaṃ cenna nivāryate ||
gauṇaṃ lākṣaṇikaṃ vā 'pi vākyabhedena vā svayam |
vedo yamāśrayatyarthaṃ ko nu taṃ pratikūlayet ||

div.p: na cātra ‘saṃdigdheṣu vākyaśeṣātjai. sa. 1—9—19 |’ ityetena tulyārthatvaṃ pratipattidvayasyāpyasaṃdigdhatvāt |
tathā—
mlecchaprasiddhivyavahartṛdaurbalye 'pi samudāyarụ̄dhibalena svarūpagatena jyāyasī pratibhāti |

lg.l: kiṃ tu nyāyyataraṃ yuktaṃ jñātumityatra cintyate ||

div.p: tathā—

lg.l: yeṣāṃ darśanamātre 'pi veda eva na paṭhyate |
ananteṣu hi deśeṣu kaḥ siddhaḥ kveti gamyatām |

div.p:
tadyathā cor—atar—pāp—māl—bair—ityeteṣāṃ śabdānāṃ krameṇa odana—mārga—sarpa—satya—udararūpeṣvartheṣu drāviḍānāmadyatve 'pi prayogo vartate |drāviḍādibhāṣāyāmeva tāvadvayañjanāntabhāṣāpadeṣu svarāntavibhaktistrīpratyayādikalpanābhiḥ svabhāṣānurūpānarthānpratipadyamānā dṛśyante | tadyathaudanaṃ corityukte corapadavācyaṃ kalpayantiṃ panthānamatarityukte 'tara iti kalpayitvā ' 'huḥ | satyaṃ dustaratvādatara
eva panthā iti | tathā pāpaśabdaṃ pakārāntaṃ sarpavacanamakārāntaṃ kalpayitvā satyaṃ pāpa evāsāviti vadanti | evaṃ mālaśabdaṃ strīvacanaṃ māleti kalpayitvā satyamityāhuḥ | vairaśabdaṃ ca rephāntemudaravacanaṃ vairiśabdena pratyāmnāyaṃ vadanti | satyaṃ sarvasya kṣudhitasyākārye pravartanādudaraṃ vairikārye pravartata iti | tadyadā drāviḍādibhāṣāyāmīdṛśī svacchandakalpanā tadā pārasībarbarayavanaraumakādibhāṣāsu kiṃ vikalpya kiṃ pratipatsyanta iti na vidmaḥ |

lg.l: pikanemādiśabdānāṃ sa evārtho bhaviṣyati || iti prāptam |

div.p: deśabhāṣāpabhraṃśapadāni hi viplutibhūyiṣṭhāni na śakyante vivektum |

lg.l: coditaṃ hyupadiṣṭaṃ vā prayuktaṃ vā kriyāgatam |

div.p: api ca—

yathaiva klomādayaḥ paśvavayavā vede coditāḥ santo 'dhvaryvādibhiḥ svayamajñāyamānārthatvādye nityaṃ prāṇivadhābhiyuktāstebhya evāvadhārya viniyujyante | yathā ca niṣādeṣṭyāṃ kūṭaṃ dakṣiṇeti vihite ya evaitena vyavaharanti temya evārthatattvaṃ jñātvā dīyate | tatheha pikanematāmarasādicoditaṃ sadvedādāryāvartanivāṃsibhyaścāpratīyamānaṃ mlecchebhyo 'pi pratīyeta lokāvagamyanityaśabdārthābhyupagamāvirodhāt svenaiva pramāṇena pratīyeteti | yattu śāstrabalīyastvādetadagrahaṇamiti | tanna | avirodhe durbalasyāpi grāhyatvādyadevātyantaṃ pramāṇābhāsameva mṛgatṛṣṇājñānavadbhavati tatsarvadaiva parihartavyaṃ, yatpunarbalavadvirodhāpekṣamapramāṇaṃ bhavati tadvirodhābhāvātpramāṇamevetyavadhāraṇīyam | na caivamādi virudhyate | viparītārthaprasiddhayantarābhāvāt | ata eva vaidikavākyārthasvaviṣayaprayuktapadārthamātrābhiyuktatarāryaprasiddhibalīyastvāśrayaṇam |

aṣṭakādiṣu hyadṛṣṭārtheṣu samūlakeṣu smaryamāṇeṣu gavādipadasvarūpatadarthajñāneṣu ca satyamāryāṇāmāptataratvābhiyuktātaratve vidyete | pikādiṣu tvāryabalenaivāvagatasvarūpamātravācakatveṣu vācyaviśeṣajñānarahitatvenā ' 'ryeṣu nirvyāpārībhūteṣu padavaddṛṣṭārthapratipattyarthānādiśabdaprayogalabdhasaṃbandhaprasiddhimlecchaprayogebhyo 'rthanirṇaye sati na kiṃcidviruddhamākāṅkṣitapadārthajñānaṃ ca setsyati | nigamaniruktavyākaraṇairapi na caivamādīnāmarthāntaraṃ kiṃcidudātdṛtaṃ, yatprāpya kṛtārthāḥ santa itareṣāṃ prasiddhiṃ parityajema |

lg.l: kālpanikyāḥ prasiddheśca yā klṛptā sā balīyasī
āśrayāṇāṃ ca daurbalyaṃ dharmaṃ prati nirūpitam |

div.p:
śabdasvarūpaṃ tāvattenābhiyuktatvācciravinaṣṭāvinaṣṭatvena na viviñcīran | yastu katha
mapyavinaṣṭa eva śabdasteṣāmapi prayogaviṣayamāpannastasya cā ' 'ryavadevānādivṛddhavyavahāraparamparayā 'rthaṃ jānanti tatkiṃ teṣāṃ nirākartuṃ śakyate |

lg.l: patrorṇaṃ dhautakauśeyaṃ bahumūlyaṃ mahādhanamityamaraḥ |patrorṇavārabāṇādikaña‌cuko vārabāṇo 'strītyamaraḥ | yacca taddeśasaṃbhavam |
tairevākathitaṃ nāma tacca ko vedituṃ kṣamaḥ ||

div.p: tasmānna teṣāṃ vyavahāraprasiddhau daurbalyam |

nirukte na tāvallokavyavahāraprasiddhānyeva padāni tadgatakriyānimittaśabdaprayogabhāktvena nirucyate | vyākaraṇenāpi prasiddhārthānāmevāvinaṣṭasvarūpānvākhyānamātraṃ kriyate tatra prāsaṅgikameva kiyadapyarthanirūpaṇam | tāni svaviṣayādanyatra durbalānāmapi na bādhakāni |
yathā mahābhāratanirvacanānvākhyāne dvaiṣāyanenoktam |

ityevaṃ niruktavyākaraṇādyaṅgānugṛhītavedādhyayanajanitakarmāvabodhapūrvakānuṣṭhānāyattatvāt svargādisiddhyarthāpūrvasiddheravyutpannarūpe ca jñāte 'pi niruktāvagatadhātvarthapūrvakanāmārthajñāna
dvāravākyārthapratipattipūrvakānuṣṭhānādevādṛṣṭasiddhiriti mlecchasiddhapikādyarthagrahaṇe 'pi niruktādīnāmarthavattā siddheti || 10 ||
āha | ke punaḥ kalpāḥ kāni sūtrāṇīti | ucyate |

tatra sakalapratyakṣavadapratipādyakratuprayogopanibandhanādantarhitaviprakīrṇānumeyaprāyaśrutimūlasmṛtibandhanebhyo mahāneva kalpasūtrāṇāṃ viśeṣo 'stīti na tattadgatanyāyaṃ vyavasthāpya prāmāṇyāni vijñāyante |

smṛtyadhikaraṇe cāpramāṇatvaṃ mūlānupapattyā pūrvapakṣe 'bhidhāya siddhānte 'numitaśrutimūlatvena prāmāṇyaṃ sthāpitam | etāni ca na tatrodāhṛtāni pūrvapakṣahetvasaṃbhavāt | na caiṣā
miha prāmāṇyapratipādanam | atiriktaprāmāṇyāpavādapratipādanārhatvādadhikaraṇasya |
yadi dharmaṃ prati smṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇyamabhyupagamyate | tathā sati |
‘mantrabrāhmaṇayorveda iti nāmadheyaṃ ṣaḍaṅgameke’ ityaṅgānyapi vedaśabdavācyāni smaryante |

lg.l: tasmāttānyapi vedāṃ vā pramāṇāni svato 'tha vā |

div.p: śākyādayo 'pi hyevaṃ vadantyeva | yathā ‘utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmanityatā’ iti |
evametāni catvāryapi vicārasthānānyekamārgapatitāni kalpasūtravicāreṇaiva gataprāyāṇi bhaviṣyantīti manvānena tadupanyāsamātrameva kriyate |
nanu ca pauruṣeyatvādeṣāmetadubhayamapyanupapannam |

yathaiva kaṭhādiproktāḥ śākhāḥ kāṭhakādisamākhyayā 'bhidhīyanta ityakṛtrimāḥ sthāpitāstathaiva vedasamāmnātamaśakādisamākhyātagranthaniyatā 'pi pratyetavyā | yathā sāmasūktānāmidamasyā ' 'rṣamidamasyeti satyāmapi tannimittāyāṃ samākhyāyāṃ na nityatvapratighātaḥ | evaṃ prakhyātarṣiprakalpasūtragranthānāmapi | tathā hi—

yathā śaiśavaṃ bhavati śiśurvā aṅgiraso mantrakṛtāṃ mantrakṛdāsīdityatra mantrakṛcchabdaḥ prayoktari prayukta evaṃ tasya tasya kalpasya sūtrasya vā prayoktārastatkāritvena vyapadekṣyante | brahmayajñavidhāne ca ‘evaṃ vidvān svādhyāyamadhīyīta’ ityuktvā tatprapañce ‘yadṛco 'dhīte yadyajūṃṣi yatsāmāni yadbrāhmaṇāni yaditihāsapurāṇāni yatkalpān’ iti tajjapyamānatvena vidhānādārṣatvameva vijñāyate | puruṣakṛtānāṃ japanimittadharmahetutvena nityavidhiviṣayatvāsaṃbhavāt | aruṇaparāśaraśākhābrāhmaṇasya ca kalparūpatvātsarvayājñikaiśca svaśākhādhītavyatiriktakalpasūtrakāropanyastapakṣatulyabalatvādhyavasānātkalvajamantrāṇāṃ cetarasamāmnāyādhītavatkratuviniyogāśrayaṇāt tulyatvam |

lāṭadrāhyāyaṇasūtrakārābhyāmapi ca dṛḍhakalpaprāmāṇyāpekṣayedaṃ māśakamapekṣya ‘tatpratyakṣavihitaṃ cā ' 'rṣakalpena tatrānumānaṃ na vidyate’ iti brāhmaṇavihitādapyārṣakalpavihitagarīyastvamaṅgīkṛtyoktam | kātyāyanena ca kṛtākṣaṇasūtrapraṇayanaprakrame 'bhihitaṃ yajñaviṣayabrāhmaṇagatastotravidhivākyaśeṣe yathā māśakaṃ tatprāmāṇyātkariṣyate na tannirapekṣaśuddhabrāhmaṇaprāmāṇyāditi | tathā ca prāyaṇīyāgniṣṭomasāmni yajñāyajñīyena saha vaikalpikaṃ jarāyabodhīyamagniṣṭomasāma kāryamiti pañcaviṃśabrāhmaṇe 'bhihitamapi māśakānuvṛttyā kā- tyāyanenā ' 'rbhavīyagāyatratṛtīyatvenajarāsāditi lakṣitam | ārbhavīyagāyatrīgatagāyatrānantarasāmno hi tena samiti saṃjñā kṛtā | tasmācca paratvena padaikadeśaprayogeṇa jarābodhīyamuktaṃ deśabdena ca jyautiṣṭomikāgriṣṭomasāmasaṃjñābhūtena yajñāyajñīyamevāgniṣṭomasāmatvena niyatam | yadi ca kalpādbrahmaṇamatiriktaṃ kātyāyano 'maṃsyata tataḥ pratyakṣabrāhmaṇadṛṣṭaṃ vikalpamevāvakṣyat |

lg.l: aṅgānāṃ ca praṇetāra ācāryā ṛṣayo matāḥ ||

div.p: yānyapyapratyayitapuruṣavacanāni pramāṇāntarasaṃgatārthāni bhavanti tānyapi satyatvenāvadhāryante kimaṅga punaḥ satyavācāṃ vacanāni |

lg.l: satyavācāṃ ca vākyāni vaidikaiḥ saṃgatāni ca |

div.p: api ca—
tulyaṃ ca sāṃpradāyikaṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidhivacanaṃ prāgdarśitaṃ kalpagrahaṇāt |

lg.l: vedakauśalajijñāsārthaṃ tattadvedabhāgacihanalekhyāni ghaṭikāyāṃ kumbhākhyāyāṃ nikṣipya tattadveda bhāgaparīkṣākāle tānyākṛṣya ākṛṣṭalekhyacihanitaṃ paṭhantyadhyetāro na yuñjata iti ghaṭikāmārthavartino 'nuyogāḥ iti |anuyogeṣu vedānāṃ ghaṭikāmārgavṛttiṣu |
api cāṅgāni vedāśca dharmaśāstraṃ ca tulyavat |

div.p: kiṃ ca—

lg.l: yujyate hi matiḥ kartuṃ na mūlāntarakalpanā ||
anuktena ca so 'pyartha iti kiṃ nopapadyate ||
na ca saṃdihyate buddhirna viparyayate kvacit ||
pareṇa saha keṣāṃcidvā ko vākyāni jalpatām |

div.p: yādṛśatādṛśamīmāṃsakairapyatīndriyaviṣayapuruṣavacanaprāmāṇyanirākaraṇādapauruṣeyatvādhyavasāyanirākṛtakāraṇadoṣāśaṅkanirapavādaprāmāṇyasiddhiṃ pratihantumaśakyāṃ manyamānā niruttarībhūtā bālānukaraṇavākyasadṛśaiḥ svavākyairvyavalikhyamānahṛdayāḥ santo 'pi prakṣīṇakuhetuvacanajālāḥ kanyāvaraṇārthāgatamūrkhavaragotrapraśnottaravat |
tathā śabde 'pi buddherniyamānnābhivyaktirdvedhā 'pi doṣādityevamādibhiḥ sarvadā padārthasaṃbandhānityatvapratipādanāttadviparītamāgamanityatvamabhyupagamyamānaṃ lokopahāsāspadamātrameva bhavet |
tathā hi—

lg.l: paṭaṃ kartuṃ samīheta sa hanyādvyoma muṣṭibhiḥ ||

div.p: vyavahāranityatāśabdaśca kriyānityatvaparyāyaḥ tadyasya śabdārthasaṃbandhānāmanityatvaṃ tasya tadāśrayavyavahāranityatvaṃ kimādhāraṃ bhaviṣyatītyatiduḥsaṃpādam |
tenānityaśabdavādināmāgamanityatvānupapatteratīndriyaviṣayasya ca vākyasya prayogaśāstratvābhāvānnāsanniyamādityucyate |

māgadhadākṣiṇātyatadapabhraṃśaprāyāsādhuśabdanibandhanā hi te | mamāpi bhikṣavaḥ karma vartata evā ' 'śarīrapātāt |bhama vihi bhikkhave kammavacca isī save | tathā, utkṣipte loṣṭe utkṣepe 'sti kāraṇaṃ patane nāsti kāraṇam |tathā ukakhitte loḍammi uv‌ve atthi kāraṇam | paḍaṇe ṇatthi kāraṇam | astyudbhave kāraṇāmime saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ saṃbhavanti sakāraṇā akāraṇā vinaśyanti | utpattimanukāraṇamapekṣante |aṇubhave kāraṇaṃ ime saṃkaḍādharmmā saṃbhavanti sakāraṇā akāraṇā viṇasanti | aṇupyattikāraṇamityevamādayaḥ |
vedeṣu hi tāvadeva padavākyasaṃghātātmakatvādihetvābhāsaiḥ kṛtakatvabhrāntirbhavati |

lg.l: agneḥ purohitvaṃ ca kva dṛṣṭaṃ yena kīrtyate |
na jātyā devatātvaṃ hi kvacidasti vyavasthitam |
avijñātaguṇānāṃ ca kalpate stavanaṃ na tu ||

div.p: vāyuśabdena bahuvacanāntena māturviyojyamāna ekaiko vatso 'bhidhīyata iti naitad‌buddhipūrvakāriṇā cintituṃ śakyam |
ko nāma buddhipūrvakārī puruṣo 'rthābhidhānaparāṇāmṛgakṣarāṇāṃ lokavyākaraṇādiṣvanavagata pūrvamagna ityasya padasyākāramokāreṇa plutena vikuryāt |

lg.l: kiṃcideva tu tadvākyaṃ sadṛśaṃ laukikena yat |

div.p: evaṃ ca yadādhyetāro 'dhyāpayitāraḥ pārśvasthā vā vedapadavākyatadartharūpāṇyālocayanti tadā svasaṃvedyamevāpauruṣeyatvamadhyavasyanti |
tāvatā tu bāhyatārkikāṇāṃ pratītibhāvanā notpadyata iti tattatpratipādanakṣamavedotthāpitanyāyopanibandhanānmīmāṃsakaiḥ kevalaṃ yaśa eva pītam |
śākyādigrantheṣu punaryadapi kiṃcitsādhuśabdābhiprāyeṇāvinaṣṭabuddhayā prayuktaṃ tatrāpi prajñaptivijñaptipaśyatātiṣṭhatādiprāyaprayogātkiṃcidevāviplutaṃ labhyate |

kimuta yāni prasiddhāpabhraṣṭadeśabhāṣābhyo 'pyapabhraṣṭatarāṇi bhikkhave ityevamādīni dvitīyābahuvacanasthāne hyekārāntaṃ prākṛtaṃ padaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na prathamābahuvacane saṃbodhane 'pi | saṃskṛtaśabdasthāne ca kakāradvayasaṃyogo 'nusvāralopaḥ, ṛvarṇākārāpattimātrameva prākṛtāpabhraṃśeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ na ḍakārāpattirapi | so 'yaṃ saṃskṛtā dharmā ityasya sarvakālaṃ svayameva pratiṣiddho 'pi vināśaḥ kṛta ityasādhuśabdanibandhanatvādityantena hetunā vedatvākṛtakaśāstrāntaraśaṅkānivṛttiḥ | yāvāṃścākṛtako vinaṣṭaḥ śabdarāśistasya vyākaraṇamevaikamupalakṣaṇaṃ tadupalakṣitarūpāṇi ca |
asanniyamāditi ca vyākaraṇoktaniyamābhāvādityarthaḥ |
kṣaṇikatvanirākṛtanityasiddhānityatvātyantāvidyamānagranthaniyamābhyupagamābhiprāyeṇa vā 'sanniyamādityuktam |
asatāṃ vā kṣaṇabhaṅgaśūnyavādānātmakatvādīnāmasaddhetubhirvā pratipādananiyamāttadekakartṛkadharmavacanānāmapyaprāmāṇyam |
yathaiva hi kalpasūtragranthānitarāṅgasmṛtinibandhanāni cādhyetradhyāpayitāraḥ smaranti tathā ' 'śvalāyanabaudhāyanāpastambakātyāyaprabhṛtīn granthakāratvena |

na caiṣāṃ samākhyāmātrabalādeva kartṛtvamucyate | yenā ' 'khyā pravacanādityuttaramucyate puruṣaparamparayaiva hi smṛteṣu kartṛṣu samākhyā 'bhyuccayahetutvena jñāyate tathā ca kaṭhādicaraṇairanādibhiḥ procyamānānāmanādivedaśākhānāmanādisamākhyāsaṃbhavo naivaṃ nityāvasthitamā
śakādigotracaraṇapravacananimittasamākhyopapattiḥ | māśakabaudhāyanāpastambādiśabdā hyādimadekadravyopadeśina iti na tebhyaḥ prakṛtibhūtebhyo 'nādigranthaviṣayasamākhyāvyutpādanasaṃbhavaḥ | ataśca māśakādisamākhyā 'pyavidyamānagranthaniyamanādeva pravṛttetyapi hetvarthayojanā | vedarūpaniyamāvidyamānatvāditi vā 'tra hetuvyākhyā | kāmaṃ tu vedāṅgānītyanadhyāyaniyamābhāvāditi vā yojyam | yattu bhāṣyakāreṇa svarābhāvādityaniyamārthaṃ vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam |
bṛhaspatirvai devānāmudagāyadindro vṛtramahanatprajāpatirvapāmātmana udakhidat | gāvo vā etatsatramāsata tāsāṃ daśasu māssu śṛṅgāṇyajāyantetyādayaḥ kathamiva buddhipūrvakāriṇā 'rthavādāḥ praṇīyeran |

lg.l: nityatve sati yeṣāṃ hi kleśena vidhiyojanā |

div.p: na ca tādṛśavākyaśeṣamudrā 'pi kalpasūtrādigrantheṣu kācidasti yadbalenākṛtakatvameṣāmavasīyeta |
yadyapi ṣaḍaṅgameka ityanena kalpasūtrāṇāṃ vedatvaṃ bhavet |

yathaiva vidhiḥ—brāhmaṇam | vidheyo—mantraḥ | tarko—mīmāṃseti darśanārthaḥ |‘vidhirvidheyastarkaśca veda’ ityetasmindarśane sati samastavaidikatarkopasaṃhārātmikā mīmāṃsā 'pi vedaśabdavācyā bhavati natvamantrabrāhmaṇarūpatvācchandonibandhanāni kāryāṇi labhate tathā kalpasūtrāṇyapīti vidhiparyāyaprayogaśāstratvābhāvaḥ |
vedārthopasaṃhārasya kalpasūtrānapekṣaiḥ kartumaśakyatvādavaśyaṃ ca yāvadvedaṃ yāvatkarmaprayogaṃ ca kriyamāṇairapi vidyāsthānāśūnyatārthaṃ kairapi kalpasūtrairbhavitavyam |
ācāryaśabdasyārtho manvādibhirevaṃ vyākhyātaḥ |

lg.l: sāṅgaṃ ca sarahasyaṃ ca tamācāryaṃ pracakṣate || iti |

div.p: vedasaṃpradānakāle ca śiṣyāstadvacaḥsu kathaṃ nāma śraddadhīrannityevamarthamācāryavacanaṃ pramāṇamityuktaṃ na kalpasūtrakāravacanaviṣayam |
tathā 'nyatrāpyuktam | ‘tasmād‌dvayaṃ vācā vadati satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca pāppanā hyeṣā viddheti' || 13 ||

tatra yadva‌ṛttikāreṇodāharaṇaṃ pārvaṇasthālīpākaviṣayagṛhyakāravacanaśravaṇādadarśapūrṇamāsacarakakalpasūtrakāravacanādhyāropeṇa dattaṃ tadatyantādhyāropābhibhavābhiprāyaprayuktamityanādṛtam | gṛhyakāravacanaṃ hyetadakṣatahome tāvadāsāyamāhuteḥ prātarāhutirnāṃtyeti | āprātarāhuteḥ sāyamāhutirityataśca yathaivetadagnihotraviṣayatvena na kalpyate tathaivaitadapi āpaurṇamāsyā amāvāsyā nātyeti | ā 'māvāsyāyāḥ paurṇamāsītyetadapi darśapūrṇamāsaviṣayaṃ na kalpanīyamiti | tasmādanyadudāhāryam || 14 ||

lg.l: evaṃ ye dākṣiṇātyānāṃ pratīcyānāṃ ca kecana ||
udīcyānāṃ tathā ' 'cārā vicāryāḥ sarva eva te |

div.p:
purāṇamānavetihāsavyatiriktagautamavasiṣṭhaśaṅkhalikhitahārītāpastambabaudhāyanādipraṇīta
dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ gṛhyagranthānāṃ ca prātiśākhyalakṣaṇavatpraticaraṇaṃ pāṭhavyavasthopalabhyate | tadyathā gautamīyagobhilīye chandogaireva ca parigṛhīte | vāsiṣṭhaṃ bah‌vṛcaireva śaṅkhalikhitoktaṃ ca vājasaneyibhiḥ | āpastambīyabaudhāyanīye taittirīyaireva pratipanne ityevaṃ tatra tatra gṛhyavyavasthābhyupagamādi darśayitvā vicārayitavyam | kiṃ tāni teṣāmeva pramāṇānyuta sarvāṇi sarveṣāmiti |
anumīyate 'nenetyanumānaṃ liṅgamevocyate |

lg.l: tacca vyavasthitaṃ dṛṣṭavā liṅgī tatraiva gamyatām |
vidhirvā pratiṣedho vā na hi so 'nyatra liṅgayate ||

div.p: tatra granthātmakādācārātmakādvā liṅgalliṅginau vidhipratiṣedhāvanumīyamānau tadviṣayāvevānumātuṃ śakyete nānyagatau | kutaḥ—
sarvaviṣayaśāstrapraṇīto hyācāraḥ sarvadeśagataśaktimatpuruṣairagnihotravadevānuṣṭhīyeta |

lg.l: tena nūnaṃ śrutiḥ kā 'pi teṣāmevaṃ vidhāyikā ||

div.p: yasmādayaṃ deśācāro 'yaṃ vā gṛhyādigrantho 'nyathā nopapadyate yadi śrutimūlakatvaṃ nāstītyanayopapattyā mūlakalpanā tasmādvyavasthitaviṣayaiva sā 'dhyavasātavyā | tathā coktam | yadi ca heturavatiṣṭheta nirdeśāditi |

iha smṛtīrācārāṃścopalabhya mūlaśrutiṣvanumīyamānāsu kāraṇānuvidhāyikāryanyāyenāvaśyamupalabhyamānakāryānurūpakāraṇānumānairbhavitavyamiti bhāvanānāmaviśeṣavyavacchinnayāgadānahomopavāsādidhātvarthaviśeṣasvargādiphalakāraketikartavyatākdhiyastāvadanumātavyāḥ | evaṃ varjanīyeṣvapi dehendriyamanodvāravyavahāreṣu pratiṣedhyakriyākārakaṃ narakādyaniṣṭaphalapratiṣedhakaśabdānumānamavaśyaṃbhāvi tāvatā ca yogyatvamātra viṣayatvānna digdeśaparicchinnakartṛviśeṣādhikāraniyatapratipattilābhaḥ | kutaḥ—

tadiha vihitānuṣṭhānayogyatā tāvatsamastāryāvartanivāsivarṇāśramāṇāmandhabadhirajaḍabhūkādivarjamaviśiṣṭā | varjanīyayogyatvamapi yathopalabhyamānaṃ dvitricaturvarṇāśramamātrasaṃbaddhaṃ vā tadamyadhikadarśanānumitasamastamlecchādiviṣayaṃ vā vijñāyate |

yogyatvenāviśeṣapravṛtto 'pyadhikāraḥ kenacitkartṛviśeṣaṇapadena rājā rājasūyena
vaiśyo vaiśyastomenetyādivadviśeṣyeta na cātra dṛśyamānācaritṛvāci kiṃcidekamenekaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam || kutaḥ—

na tāvatprācyatvadākṣiṇātyatvādijātiḥ pratīcyodīcyādivyaktivyāvṛttā sarvaprācyādivyaktiṣvanugatā kācidupapadyate | yadvacanamupapadaṃ holākādyadhikāraṃ viśiṃṣyāt | yāstu manuṣyatvabrāhmaṇatvādijātayasteṣu vidyante tāḥ sarvadeśavāsivyaktiṣvaviśiṣṭā iti nā ' 'cārānurūpaviśeṣaṇasamarthatvena jñāyante |

na hyanantabhedānāṃ prācyādipuruṣavyaktīnāṃ vyastasamastānāṃ saṃbandhānubhavāsaṃbhavādekamabhidhānamavakalpate | etena guṇakriyājātiviśiṣṭapuruṣavyaktivacanatvaṃ pratyuktam | na hi kāścidapi guṇakriyājātivyaktayaḥ pratideśavyavasthitapuruṣavyaktyupalakṣaṇayogyāḥ saṃbhāvyante | sarvatra tatrāpi vyāvṛttyaviśeṣāt |

etadeva pratipādayan bhāṣyakāra āha | śaktamātrapuruṣādhikārapravṛttavidhānaviśeṣaṇaṃ yenopapadenānumīyamānena kriyate na tasyā ' 'kṛtivacanatā nyāyyā na vyaktivacanateti | na hyete holādyākārāḥ kāṃcidākṛtimanuvidhīyante na vyaktiṃ na hi yāvatsu puruṣeṣvete 'vasthitāstāvatāmekenāpi vyapadeśenopasaṃgrahaḥ saṃbhavati | keṣāṃcittasyā ' 'kṛtivacanatā nyāyyā na vyaktivacanateti granthasteṣāmabhiprāyaḥ | yathaiva jai. sū. 6 | 1 | 8 |‘jātiṃ tu bādarāyaṇo 'viśeṣāt’ iti sūtrakāraḥ svargakāmapadaṃ yaugikamapyuddiśyamānapuṃstvaviśeṣaṇāsaṃbhavātphalārthimātramanuṣyajātiviṣayopapatteśca sāmarthyākṣiptajātimātrādhikāraṃ vakṣyati |

kaścitpunarākhyātaśabdārthamupavarṇayannimaṃ granthapāṭhaṃ dūṣayitvā 'pūrvameva samarthayamānaḥ sūtragatayāvacchrutavidhānaśabdajanitabhrāntirvidhibhāvanayośca bhedamapaśyannubhayasvarūpanirūpaṇaparyanuyogatrāsādbhāvārthādhikaraṇasiddhāntaṃ vināśayannevamāha bhāva iti vā 'nākhyeyaḥ svadharmeṇānyadataḥ śabdajñānātkārakavaditi |

tena yaḥ kaścidākhyātapratyayārthatattvaṃ jijñāsamānaḥ pṛcchati kaḥ punarayaṃ bhāvo bhāvanā ceti taṃ pratyananyaśabdākhyeyatvāt kevalapratyayaprayogadarśanābhāvācca sarvadhātvarthasāmānyavacanakarotiparaliṅādyuccāraṇamātreṇaivottaraṃ dāsyate kuryācchabda ityarthaḥ, sarvaścā ' 'khyāyamāno 'rtha ākṛtirūpeṇa vā ' 'khyāyeta vyaktyākṛtigocarātikrāntiśca kilā ' 'khyātaśabdenopāyarahitatvādanākhyeyo 'syārtha iti | tadeva kilānenāpi granthenoktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa | na tasyā ' 'kṛtivacanatā nyāyyā na vyaktivacanateti | vidhānaśabdo hi sūtre pūrvaṃ prakṛtastameva tacchabdena nirdiśya vyaktyākṛtivacanatvādapanayati |
tadidamasaṃbaddhamevānupapattikaṃ ca śrutisāmānyamātreṇānyārthameva saccatuḥśrṛṅgādimantravadbhāṣyakārābhipretārthatyāgena svaprajñāvilasitaṃ prakāśayatā 'nyasminnevārthe yojitam |

deśācārasarvadharmopapattivicāraṇārtho 'yaṃ granthaḥ sa yadi pūrvakṛtayā vyākhyayopapadanirākaraṇaviṣayatvena varṇyate tata etatsūtravyākhyānena saṃbadhyate yathoktanyāya mārgeṇa | yadi tu tatparityāgenā ' 'khyātapratyayārthānāmanākhyeyatvāpattimeva vyaktyākṛtirahitārthatvena varṇayettato 'tyantāsaṃbandhānupayujyamānanirupapattikārthatvena heya eva syāt |
tathā hi—

yadi nāma liṅgādipratyayo bhāvanāyā vidhervā vyaktimākṛtiṃ vā vadettato holākādayaḥ pratiniyatadeśadharmāṇo bhaveyuryatastu vyaktyākṛtivinirmukto 'vyapadeśyo 'rthastasmāttadvihitadhātvarthaviṣayaḥ sarvapuruṣadharma ityevaṃ nīyamānamasaṃbaddhodāharaṇe jyeṣṭhameva syāt |

vidhyupadeśakartavyatābhāvanāśabdānāṃ hyatyantābhūtameva bahubhāṣitvaprakhyāpanāparaparyāyatvamadhyāropyā ' 'cakṣāṇena svayamanākhyeyatvamatīva sthāpitam | yadyapi tāvadākhyātapratyayaḥ kartṛśaktitadādhāradravyamātraṃ vā vadettathā 'pi brāhmaṇo yajamāna iti vadupapadādhīnaviśeṣāvasthānatvāttadadhīnajātyādivṛttitvamanurudhyamāno na svagatavyaktyākṛtivacanatvavicārādhīnādhikāritvanirṇayaḥ syātkimuta yadā kartrabhidhānanirapekṣavidhirbhāvanādimātravācitvamevāvasthāsyate | yadi caitāvanmātrameva sarvadharmatvakāraṇaṃ bhavettato rājasūyāśvamedhavaiśyastomādīnāmapyevamātmakākhyātapratyayavidheyatvāviśeṣātsarvadharmatvaprasaṅgaḥ | atha teṣāmanirdeśyārthapratyayavihitānāmapi rājādyupapadavaśādasarvadharmatvam | evaṃ tatrāpyasarvadharmatvavādinā tadevopanyasanīyam | sarvadharmatvavādinā ca nirākartavyam | taccā ' 'cārānurūpavyaktyākṛtivacanatvāsaṃbhavātsāmarthyalabhbhamanuṣyākṛtimātrādhikārapratipattervā nirākṛtameva | tadyathā cottarasūtrāṇi liṅgābhāvācca jai. sū. 1 | 3 | 19 |nityasyā ' 'khyā hi deśasaṃyogādityevamādīnyupapadopanyāsapratyākhyānārthāni saṃgaṃsyante | tasmātsarvādhikāranyāyatvādvidhānasya vyavasthitadeśācāragṛhyadharmasūtranibaddhadharmāṇāmapi sarvadharmatvam || 16 ||
yastu jātikulagotradharmavadvayavasthitavidhyanumānamiti |

yathaiva pañcāvattaṃ tu bhṛgūṇāṃ vasiṣṭhaśunakātrivadhryaśvakāṇvasaṃkṛtirājanyānāṃ nārāśaṃso dvitīyaḥ prayājastanūnapādanyeṣāmityanvayato vyatirekataścopalakṣaṇasaṃbhavādvayavasthitavidhyavasānaṃ tathaiva pratijātigotraniyatatriśikhaikaśikhādikalpavyavasthitavidhiviśeṣānumānopapattirastīti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikavaiṣamyam || 17 ||
jātivyaktivācyupapadā bhāve 'pi kartṛgatasaṃsthānavarṇādiguṇaviśeṣopalakṣaṇena kṛṣṇakeśādhānavadadhikāraniyamaḥ setsyatītyāśaṅkya nirākriyate—

yastu liṅgaviśeṣaṇaṃ nityaśabdaṃ manyate tasyopasarjanībhūtaliṅgasāpekṣatvādasamarthasamāsaprasaṅgaḥ | nanu liṅgaśabdasya nityasāpekṣatvātsvārthākṣiptasaṃbandhyantaratvena sāmarthyavighātābhāvādbhavitavyameveha samāsena devadattasya gurukulamiti yathā |

lg.l: nityaṃ nāpekṣate liṅgaṃ devadattaṃ yathā guruḥ ||

div.p: guruśabdasya hi śiṣyāpekṣa evā ' 'tmalābha iti devadattaśabdopāttaśiṣyasaṃbandhānatirekāntarṇītasvārthatvānnābhyadhikāpekṣākṛtasāmarthyapratibandhaprasaṅgaḥ |
yadyapi caiṣa gamyagamakasaṃbandhe sati liṅgaśabdaḥ pravartate tathā 'pi guruśiṣyapitāputrādisaṃbandhavannāsya tadapekṣapravṛttinimittasaṃbandhiśabdatvaprasiddhiḥ |

liṅgayate 'neneti hi kriyāyoganimitto yadyapi liṅgaśabda iti na saṃbandhiśabdatvenocyate tathā 'pi tu kriyāmatakārakāntarāpekṣāṃ na muñcatīti kāmaṃ ‘liṅgino liṅgadarśanam’ ityādau bhavedapyasāmarthyaparihāraḥ | nityatvaṃ punarlabdhasvārthaliṅgāpekṣitaṃ taddharmatayā ṣaṣṭhayopanīyata iti tatsaṃbandhāpekṣāyāmaparihāryo 'sāmarthyaprasaṅgaḥ | tasmānnityasyeti niyatacih‌nopalakṣyakartṛviśeṣaṇamevādhikāraviśeṣaṇaṃ vā niyatasya karturnityasyādhikārasya vā na pratipādakaṃ kiṃciccih‌namastīti na tadabhidhāyyupapadaviśeṣitavyavasthitaholākādividhānopapattiḥ || 18 ||
sarve hi deśācārāḥ prācyadākṣiṇātyādisamākhyātaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kriyante samākhyāvarjiteṣu ca nopalabhyante | tasmātsamākhyāviśiṣṭavidhyanumānāttatsaṃyuktapramāṇapakṣa eva jyāyāniti | tatra samādhiḥ |

samākhyāyāstāvanna deśādanyannimittamasti tadviśiṣṭavidhivihitāścā ' 'cārāḥ kevalameva taddeśasaṃbandhamanuvarteran | ubhayathā 'pi tu vyabhicārānna deśanimittasamākhyāviśiṣṭavidhānakalpanā ghaṭate || 19 ||
aparastvanayaivopapattyā labdhātmīyapakṣopapattiḥ pratyavatiṣṭhamāna āha—‘na syāddeśānteraṣviti cet’ iti |

lg.l: astu vā nirnimittaiva viśekṣyati tathā 'pi tu |

div.p: tasmādanimittayā samākhyayaivādhikāraviśeṣasiddherna vyabhicārideśanimittatvamasyāḥ kalpayitavyamityukte 'bhidhīyate || 20 ||

‘so 'syapā. sū. ( 4—3—89 ) | nivāsaḥ’ tatrapā. sū. ( 4—3—53 ) | bhavastatrapā. sū. (4—3–25 ) | jātastatapā. sū. ( 4—3—74 ) | āgata ityevamādinimittaparityāgena na kadācitprācyādisamākhyā vartate | na caiṣā deśasaṃyogaṃ vyabhicarati | na caināmācāro 'nuvartate tannivāsināmapi keṣāṃcidanācaraṇācciranirgataputrapautrādīnāṃ ca deśāntareṣvapyācaraṇāditi na samākhyayā niyatavidhisiddhiḥ | yattu mathurāmabhiprasthito māthura iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ pā. sū. 4—3—5 |‘tattadgacchati pathi dūtayoriti vā dūtaviṣayaṃ kalpayitavyamapratyayitoktatvādvopekṣitavyam | sarvasminnapi prasthite taddhitasmaraṇābhāvāt || 21 ||
idānīṃ kartṛviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭavidhyanumānātpratihataḥ karmāṅgabhūtaprāgdeśādividhyanumānasaṃbhavaṃ manyamāna āha—‘karmadharmo vā pravaṇavat’ iti |

lg.l: deśo bhavati karmāṅgaṃ prāgdeśādistathā bhavet || iti || 22 ||

div.p: ekasmātpadātprayoganānātvadarśanādanekārthapratibhāne sati vikalpadoṣabhayādanekādṛṣṭaśaktikalpanāprasaṅgācca gauṇamukhyavibhāgamāśritya vyavasthitaśāstraprayogabalenāvyavasthite laukikaprayogabādhād‪vyavahārādiśabdānāmarthanirṇayaḥ pratipāditaḥ | evaṃ punarekasmin gavādāvarthe gogāvyādayo bahavaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante tatra vṛddhavyavahārāvagatapratiśabdasamavāyivācakaśaktibhedopapatteḥ śāstrasthasarvaśabdaprayogāṇāṃ ca laukikaśabdairavirodhātpadapūrvakatvācca vākyātmakaśāstravyāpārasiddherna padagatasādhvasādhutvapratipādane vyāpāro bhavati, itaretarāśrayatvaprasaṅgāt | tathā hi—
vākyārtheṣu hi śrutismṛtyācāravirodhadarśanādbalābalamānupūrvyeṇāvadhṛtamiha tu na viparītakramatvāt |

tena bherīśaṅkhādiśabdā gakārakakārādayaḥ pratyekaṃ tadvargā vā 'narthakatvādapaśabdā iti lokavyavahārādevārthaṃ na sādhayantītyasādhavo gamyante | gāvyādayaḥ punargavādivadeva sādhayantyarthaṃ tebhyo 'pi vā śīghrataraṃ prasiddhataratvādarthapratītimutpādayantīti satyapyekaviṣayānekaśabdatve hastakarapāṇyādiśabdavadarthasādhanatvātsādhutvenāvadhāryante |

pratyakṣeṇa tāvadubhayatrāpyaviśeṣeṇa varṇāḥ śuddhāḥ pratīyante | na tadgate tatsamudāyagate vā sādhutvāsādhutve | na vā 'nanubhūtasaṃbandhādanumīyete | tannirākaraṇācca tatpūrvakapuruṣavacananirākriyā 'pi siddhā | vedavacanaṃ punarvastusvarūpatadgataguṇadoṣānvākhyānaparaṃ vidhipratiṣedhānapekṣaṃ naiva kiṃcitpramāṇatvena saṃbhavati | sādhutvāsādhutvayorananuṣṭhānātmakatvādvidhipratiṣedhaviṣayatvam | abhidhābhāvanākaraṇabhūtayorvidheyatvapratiṣedhyatvasaṃbhava iti cenna | pratiśabdamanantavidhipratiṣedhavākyānumānakalpanānupapatteḥ |

lg.l: yo hi pratipadaṃ pāṭhaṃ sādhūnāṃ nādhyavasyati |

div.p:
vrīhyādīni hi kalañjādīni ca niyatajātiguṇādirūpeṇa parijñāyamānaparimāṇatvā
dvidhipratiṣedhagocarīmavantipañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā brahmakṣattreṇa rāghava | śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhā śaśaḥ kūrmaśca pañcamaḥ | vā. rā. ki. kā. sarga 17 || ślo. 37 | na tu gavādigāvyādīnāṃ jātirūpeṇa vyaktirūpeṇa vā vidhipratiṣedhāvupapadyete | na tāvatsādhvasādhutve jātiguṇādyātmakasāmānyarūpeṇa sarvavyaktayanugate vijñāyete yadālambanau dvāveva vidhipratiṣedhāvanumīyeyātāṃ sādhubhirbhāṣeta nāsādhubhiriti |

tena yadyekaikā vyaktirvidhīyeta pratiṣedhyeta vā tato yāvatpadaṃ vākyānyanumimānastrailokyapūraṇādapyadhikāni smṛtimūlabhūtāni vedavākyānyanumimīte | na ca tāvatāṃ koṭiśatabhāgo 'pyāmnātuṃ śakyate | na cānāmnātasya smṛtimūlatvam | nityānumeyaśrutimūlapratiṣedhāt | na ca vācakatvāvācakatvanibandhanau vidhipratiṣedhau saṃbhavataḥ | sarveṣāṃ vācakatvāt |

na hyudakaṃ pibedagniṃ na pibediti ca vidhipratiṣedhau saṃbhavataḥ | avaśyaṃ ca vyākaraṇasmṛtimūlabhūtasādhuvidhiśrutirasādhupratiṣedhaśrutirubhayaṃ vā saṃyogapṛthaktvāt kalpanīyam | triṣvapi ca pakṣeṣu sādhvanuśāsanamātrameva saukaryādāśritam | yadi hyapaśabdapratiṣedhamūlaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tatasteṣāṃ bahutvādavyavasthitarūpatvācca na svarūpamavagantuṃ śakyata iti ‘pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā’ iti smṛtinyāyenānugataviparītabhāṣaṇapratiṣedho 'rthāpattisiddhaḥ smaryate | sādhuvidhipakṣe tu ta eva smartavyāḥ | ubhayapakṣe tu tadanugamādevetarasiddheḥ pratiṣedhaviṣayajñānopapattiḥ | sa eṣa vyākaraṇasya pakṣatraye 'pyekānugamanibandhanatvātkathaṃcitsaṃkṣepo 'vakalpate | nanu pratiśabdaṃ vidhipratiṣedhāvaklṛptiḥ | anantavākyapāṭhāsaṃbhavādiṣṭāsaṃbhavadarśanārthameva holākādhikaraṇe 'bhihitam | na tasyā ' 'kṛtivacanatā nyāyyā na vyaktivacanateti | tasmādasaṃbhavanmūlatvādapasmṛtiḥ |

lg.l: atha prāptaśca yo 'rthaḥ syānna sa śāstrasya gocaraḥ |

div.p: athārthalakṣaṇatve 'pi śāstreṇa dharmāya prayoganiyamātprayogotpattiśāstratvaṃ syāditi | tadanupapannam | niyamaviṣayāsaṃbhavāt |
tena pakṣadvaye 'pi niyamānupapattiḥ | kīdṛśaścātra niyamaḥ kalpyeta | kiṃ sādhubhireva bhāṣitavyamuta sādhubhirbhāṣitavyameveti |
yadi hyekārthāḥ sādhvasādhavoḥ vikalpena prāpnuyustataḥ sādhuniyamāvakāśaḥ syāt | tvanmate tu punaḥ—
atha pramādāśaktikṛtaprasaṅganivṛttirniyamaṃ prayuñjīta | tadasat |
dṛṣṭo 'paśabdānāmarthābhidhāne prayoga iti cet | ucyate—
na ca niyamānāṃ pratipakṣanivṛttiḥ prayojanam | passiṃkhyāprayojanatvāt | na cāyaṃ parisaṃkhyāviṣayo yujyate | yugapatprāptyabhāvāt |
na hi tādṛśeṣvadṛṣṭakalpanāyāmarthāpattiḥ prabhavati | parārthatvācca phalaśruterarthavādatvam | na cāsati phale śakyamapūrvaṃ kalpayitum |

śabdasya tāvadatyantaparārthadṛṣṭārthatvānnā pūrveṇa kaścidupakāraḥ | satyapi cābhidhānakarmatvenārthasya prādhānye dṛṣṭārtheṣu lokavyavahāreṣu vinā 'pyapūrveṇāṅgabhāvādapūrvopakārānupayogaḥ | śrotuḥ punarniyamavidhisaṃsparśānantargatatvādevāsaṃskāryatvam | buddhayośca kṣaṇikatvānna kālāntarāvasthāyyapūrvādhāratvopapattiḥ |

lg.l: vaktā tu bhāṣaṇe sarvo guṇabhūto vidhīyate |

div.p: na cehoccāraṇamuccārayitrarthaṃ yena bhojanādisamatvaṃ pratipadyeta | svarūpeṇa punarbhaṅigatvād‌buddhivadevāsaṃskārārham |

lg.l: yuktā śabdasmṛtervaktuṃ na cāsyāḥ śāstratā svayam ||

div.p: taduktaṃ ‘prayogaśāstramiti cennāsanniyamāt ’ iti |
sarvatra hi pauruṣeyādvacanādevamayaṃ puruṣo vedeti pratyayastena kartrabhiprāyaprakāśanamātropayuktatvādva‌yākaraṇānnaiva śabdagatasādhvasādhuvibhāgaḥ pratīyate |

lg.l: na ca smṛtyantaraṃ kiṃ cid‌dṛṣṭaṃ tatkāryagocaram |

div.p: prāyeṇa manugautamavasiṣṭhādipraṇītāḥ samāneṣvartheṣu dharmasaṃhitā vartante | tenāvigānāttābhya eva śrutayaḥ svanumānāḥ | na ca vyākaraṇasya tābhiḥ samānārthatvam |

yeṣvapi tadgrantheṣu vispaṣṭānyādita evā ' 'rabhya prayojanāni jñāyante na caiṣāṃ śravaṇagrahaṇadhāraṇeṣu mahānkhedasteṣvapi jijñāsūtsāhārthaṃ pūrvaṃ prayojanānyeva nibadhyante, ‘dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāmo,’ āpastambaparibhāpāsūtram | 1 | 1‘yajñaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ’ ityevamādibhiḥ | iha punaratyantakaṣṭaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ praṇayatā sūtrakāreṇa dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ na kasyacitprayojanatvamāśritam | na ca sarvapradhāne vastunyanādaro yuktaḥ | sujñātatvaṃ punarīdṛśaṃ yenādyāpi vivadante |

lg.l: yatheṣṭaṃ varṇitaṃ tacca na śāstrasadṛśaṃ matam ||

div.p:
śāstrārtho hi nirūpitarūpo bhavati | iha ca jñānadharmatvamupanyasyādharmaprasaṅgabhītena
śāstrapūrvaprayoge 'bhyudaya iti vārtikakāreṇoktam | bhāṣyakāra āha—atha vā punarastu jñāne dharma iti | na caivamaniyamena dharmatvāvadhāraṇaṃ yuktam |

tadiha yadi tāvajjñānameva dharmatvenāvadhāritaṃ tato lokaprasiddhasyaiva prayogasya jñānāttu niṣpāditatvena satyāmapyupakāranirvṛttau vājinādivatprayojakatvābhāvaḥ | śāstrapūrvakaprayogapakṣe tu jñānasya tadaṅgatvena nirākāṅkṣabhūtatvāt | asatyāṃ prayojanāntarākāṅkṣāyāṃ yadyapi kācitphale śrutirbhavetsā 'pi ‘dravyasaṃskārakarma’jai. sū. ( 4—3—1 ) | ityanena nyāyenārthavādatayā jñāyate | na hi samānādhvanoḥ parasminphalavati jñāte pūrvasyāpi phalavattā jñāyata iti varṇitametat | “yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainamevaṃ veda” iti | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: na hi vyākaraṇāpekṣā vartate vaidikī śrutiḥ ||

div.p: yannāma jñānaṃ nityena vedenaiva kriyate tatra tatpūrvakaprayogavidhānaṃ phalāyopapadyate | vyākaraṇajñānaṃ tu pauruṣeyaṃ granthādhīnatvānmantrārthavādagatānityasaṃyogaparihāranyāyenānādivedaviṣayatvena nāvadhāryate |

athāpi vyavahāranityatānyāyena pauruṣeyavyākaraṇaparamparā 'nādiḥ kalpyeta tathā 'pi uktaṃ tu śabdapūrvatvamjai. sū. ( 1—1—8 ) ityasya nyāyasya sthitatvāt | anekapuruṣakṛtamapi sadvayākaraṇaṃ vedālambanatvaṃ na pratipadyate |
atha ‘lakṣyalakṣaṇe vyākaraṇam’ma. bhā. paspaśāhnike | iti satyapi lakṣaṇāṃśakṛtrimatve lakṣyāṃśena nityena nityo vidhirupapatsyata iti | tadanupapannam | kutaḥ—
nanu veda eva vyākaraṇanityatvaṃ dṛśyate | yathā ' 'ha—tasmādeṣā vyākṛtā vāgudyata ititai. saṃ. ( 6—4—7 ) | | naitadasti |

avyākṛtāyā hi laukikyā vācaḥ śiṣyācāryasaṃbandhena svaravarṇamātrākramairaviplutarūpairnirūpitākāraireva vaidikī vyākṛtetyucyate | tasyāśca mantrabrāhmaṇātmikāyāḥ karmasu jñāne prayoge ca dharmo 'styeva | yadapi caikaḥ śabdaḥ sabhyagma. bhā. ( 66—1—84 ) | jñātaḥ suprayuktaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavatīti tadapi svādhyāyapraśaṃsāśeṣabhūtameva | ‘aharahaḥ svādhyāyamadhīyīta” ityatra ‘apyekāmṛcaṃ yajuḥ sāma vā’ ityetadavaśyakartavyatāniyamārthamuktam |

śāstrānvita iti ca yathāsvādhyāyamanugata ityarthaḥ | samyakprayukta iti copanayanopasadanaguruśuśrūṣādarbhapavitrapāṇitvādītikartavyatopapannatvāśrayaṇenoktam | yadapi ca “tasmād brāhmaṇena na mlecchitavai nāpabhāṣitavai mleccho ha vā eṣa yadapaśabdaḥ” iti, tatsaṃpradāyāgatavaidikaśabdavināśapratiṣedhārthameva | vaidikāccāpetatvāllaukikasyāpaśabdatvaṃ saṃbhavati | sujñānaṃ ca | na ca laukikādapyapeto 'paśabdo nāma kaścidasti | gāvyādīnāmapi śabdānāṃ śrotragrāhyatvena śabdaśabdavācyatvaśabdabuddhigrāhyatvaśabdatvānugamadarśanāt | athāpyavaśyaṃ laukikādapyapeto 'paśabda āśrayaṇīyaḥ | tathā 'pi “na mlecchabhāṣāṃ śikṣeta” ityevamādismṛtyanusaraṇena himavadvindhyāntarālakṛṣṇamṛgasaṃcaraṇādyupalakṣitadharmādhikṛtāryāvartanivāsivyatiriktabarbarādibhāṣāgatasya mlecchitatvasamānādhikaraṇāpaśabdatvajñānāttena bhāṣaṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate | yuktaṃ ca tasyāśeṣatadīyācaraṇavatpariharaṇīyatvaṃ natvāryāvartanivāsiprayukteṣu gāvyādiṣu mlecchatidhātvarthānugamaḥ kaścit | yena tadanācāritatvenāpavṛttavadapaśabdatvaṃ nirūpyate | yadapi ca “āhitāgnirapaśabdaṃ prayujya prāyaścittīyāṃ sārasvatīmiṣṭiṃ nirvapet ” iti | tadapyanṛtavādabaidikaśabdavināśamlecchabhāṣāprayogāśrayameva veditavyaṃ na tu vyākaraṇānugatavyatiriktaśabdaprayogaviṣayam | tathāhi—

prāyeṇa hi śiṣṭānāṃ dharmācārapraṇihitacetasāṃ kaścideva pramādādalpo 'nācāro bhavati | gāvyādiśabdaprayogeṣu punarna keṣāṃcidapyanācārabuddhiḥ | na ca kalañjādibhakṣaṇavadvi
cikitsā garhā vā dṛśyate | na cā ' 'hitāgnisahasre 'pyekastvadabhimatasādhuśabdaireva vyavaharamāṇo dṛśyate |

‘ samānamitaracchayenena ’ ityāditakārāntaprathamāntanapuṃsakaprayogeṣu maśakena tatra tatra prayuktaṃ, “ samānamitaraṃ jyotiṣṭomena ” “ samānamitaraṃ gavā eekāhikena ” iti sūtrakāreṇāpyabhihitamchāndogyasūtrakāreṇetyarthaḥ | | “ ahīne bahiṣpavamānaiḥ sadasi stuvīran ” iti kartrabhiprāyakriyāphalavarjite 'pyṛtvikkartṛke stavane “ yajanti yājakā ” itivatparasmaipade prayoktavye vyākaraṇamanapekṣyā ' 'tmanepadaṃ prayuktam | tathā ' 'śvalāyanena “ pratyasitvā prāyaścittuṃ juhayuḥ ” iti samāse 'pi lyamna prayuktaḥ | ājyenākṣiṇī ājya ityasamāse 'pi prayuktaḥ | tathā śikṣāyāṃ nāradena “ pratyūṣe brahma cintayet ” iti gāvyādiśabdatulya eva prayuktaḥ | tathā manunā 'pi “ jñātāraḥ santi metyuktvā ” ityatra santi ma ityuktveti vaktavye vyākaraṇamanapekṣyaiva saṃhitā kṛtā | tathā mīmāṃsāyāmapi gavyasya ca tadādiṣu’a. 8 pā. 2 sū. 18 | iti gorvikārāvayavaviṣayasādhuprayogayogyaḥ śabdo 'nyatraiva gavāmayane prayuktaḥ | tathā ‘dyāvostatheti cet’jai. sū. ( 9—5 ) iti dyāvāpṛthivyoriti vaktavye lakṣaṇahīnameva bahu prayuktam | tathā gṛhyakāreṇa mūrdhanyabhighrāṇamiti vaktavye mūrdhanyabhijighrāṇamityaviṣaye jighrādeśaḥ prayuktaḥ | kātsn‌rye 'pi vyākaraṇasya nirukte hīnalakṣaṇāḥ prayogā bahavo yadvadbrāhyaṇo bravaṇāditi | saṃvatsaraṃ śāśayānā ityetanmantragatamaṇḍūkaviṣayabrāhmaṇaśabdanirvacane kriyamāṇe vacanaśīlatvanimittatāṃ darśayatā bruvo vaciriti vacyādeśamakṛtvaiva bravaṇāditi prayuktam |
yugapadubhābhyāṃ dantābhyāṃ yaḥ prahāraḥ sa ubhābhya iti sarvaiḥ pālakāryarājaputrādibhirvyākaraṇānapekṣameva prayuktam |

lg.l: sāmānyaṃ chāndasaṃ vā 'pi yeṣāṃ nāstyeva lakṣaṇam ||

div.p:
na hi te suptiṅupagrahādivyatyayena nāpi katipayādhikāradṛṣṭena ‘bahulaṃ chandasi’ ityanena sidhyanti | tadyathā madhyaṃ āpasya tiṣṭhati | nīcīnavāraṃ varuṇaḥ kabandhamitiṛ. saṃ. ( 4—4—30 ) | |
na hyapāmityasya nityastrīliṅgabahuvacanaviṣayavyañjanāntaprātipadikaparapaṣṭhayā 'nvākhyānādāpasyetyetadrūpaṃ lakṣaṇānugataṃ dṛśyate | nāpi dvāraśabdasya sthāne lāṭabhāṣāto 'nyatra vāraśabdaḥ saṃbhavati | tenānāramya evāyaṃ viṣayavyāptyasaṃbhavāt |

sūtre tāvat ‘janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ’pā. sū. ( 1—4—30 ) | ityatra hi dvāvapaśabdau janiśabdena hi ikśtipau dhātunirdeśa ityanena lakṣaṇenānvito dhātureva nirdiśyate | na ca tasya kartuḥ prakṛterapādānasaṃjñeṣyate | jāyamānasya punararthasya janiśabdo vācakatayā naiva lakṣaṇenānugataḥ | tenāyaṃ daridra ivāśvaśabdo janimātravācitvāttadarthaṃ pratyasādhureva vijñāyate | tathā | ‘tṛjakābhyāṃ kartari’pā. sū. ( 2—2—10 ) | iti pratiṣiddhaṣaṣṭhīsamāsaprayogādvyākaraṇaphalaparityāgaḥ | evaṃ tatprayojaka itipā. sū. (1—7—55 ) | pratiṣiddha eva samāsaḥ | tathā vārtike 'pi dambherhalagrahaṇasya jātivācakatvātsiddhamiti | tathā ‘ānyabhāvyaṃ tu kālaśabdavyavāyāt’ iti | atra kleśena samāsaṃ kalpayitvā tataḥ samāsasaṃjñayā guṇavacanasaṃjñāyāṃ bādhitāyāṃ ‘guṇavacanabrāhyaṇādibhyaḥ’pā. sū. ( 5—1—1—24 ) iti lakṣaṇenāsaṃsṛṣṭa eva ṣyañprayuktaḥ | bhāṣye 'pyaviravikanyāyeneti dvaṃdvagarbhe tatpuruṣe pūrvasamāsapūrvapadasthāyāḥ supaḥ ‘supo dhātuprātipadikayoḥ’pā. sū. ( 2—4—11 ) | iti pratyakṣopadiṣṭo 'pi luṅna kṛtaḥ | tathā 'nyathā kṛtvā coditamanyathā kṛtvā parihāra iti | ‘anyathaivaṃ katham’pā. sū. ( 6—4—27 ) | ityanvākhyātasādhutvo 'pi ṇamul na prayuktaḥ | na caiṣāṃ nipātanaiḥ sādhutvasiddhiḥ | kutaḥ—

pratyakṣasmṛtivirodhe tu lakṣaṇarahitasyāpi prayogādeva śiṣṭācārabhūtādavayavānugamasmṛtimanumāya nipātanātsādhutvasiddhiḥ | na ca lakṣaṇaśabdānāṃ svātmani kriyāvirodhādātmārthatvābhāvādvā lakṣaṇānugatiranādaraṇīyā |

tathā ca ‘kutvaṃ kasmānna bhavati vṛddhiḥ’ma. bhā. (1—1—1 ā. 3) | iti | ko 'yaṃ śabda ityādiṣu lakṣaṇānugamādaraḥ sarvatrā ' 'śritaḥ| yadi ca lakṣaṇaśabdeṣu lakṣaṇaṃ na pravarteta, tataḥ sarvaṃ vyākaraṇamapaśabdaireva nibaddhaṃ syāt | ardhavaiśasadarśanāttu pramāṇatvahāniḥ | athocyeta yajñaprayogaviṣaya eva sādhubhāṣaṇaniyamo na sūtrakāravyākhyānādikriyāsviti | tadasat | svarge loke kāmadhugiti phalavattvopanyāsāt | sārasvatīvidhāvāhitāgnigrahaṇārthavattvāt | itarathā hyāhitāgnireva yajñeṣvadhikriyata iti tadgocare 'paśabdaprayoge niṣprayojanamevā ' 'hitāgnigrahaṇaṃ bhavet | yo 'pi ca jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇe vājasaneyināṃ “tasmādbrāhmaṇo na mlecchet” iti pratiṣedhaḥ karmāṅgatvena jñāyate so 'pi gurusaṃpradāyakramāgatamantraprayogavināśaviṣaya eva mlecchabhāṣāpratiṣedhārtho veti pūrvavadeva netavyaḥ | yadapi ca ‘keṣāṃ śabdānām’ma. bhā. paspa. | iti praśnānantaraṃ ‘laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca’ iti vivekakathanaṃ tadapi bahūnāṃ tāva tpratyakṣapratyabhijñānāllokavedayorabhede sati stokapravibhāgāpekṣaṃ naivedamatyantabhedāśrayasadṛśamabhidhīyamānaṃ śobhate na ca laukikamadhye gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyevamādayaḥ sarve vedasādhāraṇā vedādeva voddha‍ṛtya lokena prayuktā udāhartuṃ nyāyyāḥ | ya eva hi bhāṣāyāmityeva smaryante, na ca kvacidapi vede dṛṣṭapūrvā ityevaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyante ta evodāhartavyāḥ | vaidikodāharaṇeṣvapi ca lokaprasiddhā eva śamādaya udāhṛtāḥ | na ca vākyodāharaṇena laukikebhyo bhidyante | vākyānāṃ vyākaraṇenānanvākhyānāt | ataśchāndasānyeva kāni cit “gṛbhṇāmi” “datvāyātha” ityevamādīnyudāhartuṃ yogyāni na “śaṃno devīḥ” ityevamādīni | chāndasodāharaṇaṃ ca kutaḥ ‘siddhe’ ‘lokata’siddhe śabdārthasaṃbandhe, lokato 'rthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamo yathā laukikavaidikeṣu iti mahāvārtike | ityanena pratyāsannenaiva vyāhanyeta | yadi ca laukikānāmanvākhyānaṃ kriyet, tataḥ sutarāṃ gāvyādaya evānvākhyeyāsteṣāṃ vyavasthitaṃ laukikatvaṃ vedeṣvapragogāt | punaradhyetṛbhirvedādevoddha‍ṛtyoddha‍ṛtya prayuktā iti śakyaṃ vaktum | tathā ca manunā 'pyuktam | vedaśabdemya evā ' 'dau pṛthak saṃsthā vinirmama iti | dṛśyante cādyatve 'pi śrotriyā laukike 'pyarthe vivakṣite tadbhāṣāsamānārthānsakalamantrānapyudāharantaḥ kimaṅga punaḥ pādānpadāni vā | na cā ' 'śritapratipadapāṭhānāṃ vaidikānāṃ lakṣaṇena kāryam | na caiṣāṃ gurumukhātsādhīyo lakṣaṇamasti ‘dṛṣṭānuvidhitvācchandasa’ iti svayameva lakṣaṇasyā ' 'mnānādhīnatvena mandaprayojanatvamuktam |
śiṣyācāryasaṃbandho hi mahānvedarakṣāheturvyākaraṇānadhīnasyāpi vedakramasyādhyayanenaiva rakṣyamāṇatvāt | tadvināśe 'pi ca viśiṣṭataradoṣaprasaṅgāt | uktaṃ ca—

aucchikye hi sarvāṇi sāmaparvāṇi yathākramaṃ lakṣaṇenānugatāni tataśca samastasāmarūpasiddhernirākāṅkṣattvaṃ bhavati | brāhmaṇavidhivaśena ca, ṛgantarasaṃcāraṇāyāṃ prastāvādipañcadhāvibhāgena lakṣaṇopayogaḥ | padānugamamātranivṛttavyāpāreṇa tu vyākaraṇena viśiṣṭapadaracanātmakavākyasaṃghātarūpāṇāmasaṃbhavatkartavyapadavākyānāṃ mandamiva rakṣitavyaṃ dṛśyate |
kiṃ ca—

lg.l: kakṣāvalambinaṃ nityaṃ ko nāma karakaṃ vahan |
loke yasya yadarthatvamāptā vā yatra ye matāḥ |

div.p: na tu vedādhyāyināṃ kadācidapyabhiyuktatarasahādhyāyivyatirekeṇa vedavarṇapadavākyājñānasaṃdehaviparyayavyāvṛttau vyākaraṇaṃ vaiyākaraṇā vopayujyante |

lg.l: na vināśayituṃ vedo labhyate tena rakṣyate ||

div.p: tasmādvedarakṣārthaṃ tāvannādhyeyaṃ vyākaraṇam |

yadi tu saṃvyavahāravākyeṣvanupayujyamānamapi kāvyanāṭakalakṣaṇaprākṛtavyākaraṇadvipadīrāsakādilakṣaṇanyāyena saṃskṛtakāvyopayogārthaṃ vyākaraṇamāśrīyeta, tathā 'pi kāvyaprayoganiyamotpattyaśāstratvādyatheṣṭabhāṣābhiḥ prabandhakaraṇasaṃbhavācchabdeṣu ca vyavasthā syādityucyate |
tena loke 'pi na kadācidvayākaraṇena śabdarakṣā |
tathā ca—

lg.l: jāyeta sa kathaṃ tatra padaṃ yogyaṃ na lapsyate ||
veda eva hi sarveṣāmādarśaḥ sarvadā sthitaḥ |

div.p:
devatāpadāni tāvat | ‘vidhiśabdasya mantratve bhāvaḥ syāt’(10 4 23) | ityetena nyāyena sarvāneva sādhvasādhutvasaṃmatānparyāyānparityajya vidhigataprayogānusaraṇenaiva tadvākyaśeṣavākyāntarādhigatārthābhidhānarūpeṇa prayujyante teṣu hyastyeva karmābhidhānārthameva prayogotpattiśāstratvam | yāni tu dravyatadguṇādipadāni saṃnihitārthaparyupasthāpitasamastarūpāṇi prayogavacanagocaramāgacchanti teṣvasaṃnihitārthapadanivṛttinyūnasākāṅkṣamantravākyanirākāṅkṣīkaraṇāya smṛte 'pyarthe prayujyamāneṣu prayogotpattyaśāstratvānna vyavasthā syādityucyate | prakṛtau hi mantrāṇāṃ prayogotpattiḥ śāstravatī vikṛtau, punararthavaśādbhavantī na vyākaraṇānugateṣvevāvatiṣṭhate | vyākaraṇasyāpyasaṃbhāvyamānamūlaśāstrasya kṛtakāvidhāyakeṣṭyupasaṃkhyā
nādyāvāpasūtrapratyākhyānānavasthitapramāṇatvasya yathārucivikalpitaprakṛtipratyayaparimāṇādidoṣagrastasya niścitasmaryamāṇapāṇinyādimatasāpekṣasya naivānādiyajñagataśabdaprayoganiyamotpattiśāstratvamavakalpate |
api ca vyākaraṇenohakaraṇamaśakyameveti manvānaiṣṭīkākārairapyuktam—

lg.l: etāni nohaṃ gacchanti adhrigaudaivyāḥ śamitāra ārabhadhvamityādiḥ paśuviśasanaprapamantro 'dhriguśabdavattvenādhrigurityucyate | viṣamaṃ hi tat ||
karmaṇāṃ nocyate tatra kiṃ vedādhyayanaṃ phalam ||

div.p: sarvasya hi hyanuṣṭhātavyasyā ' 'gamo mūlatvenā ' 'khyāyate na prayojanatvena |
niṣkāraṇaṣaḍaṅgavedādhyayanopanyāsena hi sutarāṃ vyākaraṇasya niṣprayojanatvamuktam |

tasmāt ‘svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ’ ityetatkevalavedādhyayanavidhānaṃ śatapathādiṣu dṛṣṭamupapannaṃ ca nityārthālambanatvāt | vyākaraṇādyaṅgādhyayanavidhānaṃ punarna kasyāṃcicchākhāyāṃ śrūyate | na cā ' 'dimadarthaviṣayaṃ sadanāditvādhīnaṃ vedatvaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ vā labhate |
tasmādavayavaviṣayamevaitadevaṃ varṇayitavyam |

lg.l: taiḥ ṣaḍ‌bhiḥ pravibhaktaḥ sansa hi karmavibodhanaḥ ||

div.p: nanu bāhyāṅgānapekṣatve vedasvarūpāntargataśrutyādyapekṣayā viśeṣaṇamanarthakaṃ prasajyate | tathā hi—
ucyate—

lg.l: jñātvā 'dhīte sa evāsya vidherarthaṃ karoti naḥ ||

div.p: tataśca mīmāṃsādvārā vedārthānucintanavidhirevāyamiti jñāyate na vyākaraṇādhyayanavidhiḥ |
‘taddadhno dadhitvam’ ityevamādīni hi vaidikārthavādāntargatānyeva hi niruktavyākaraṇādīni taiḥ vidhāyako vedo 'dhyetavya iti smṛtyartho bhavet |

yāni hi vedavyāpāraparāṇyeva teṣu liṅgena śakyamaṅgatvamadhyavasātum | nanu katibhayaspṛṣṭavedavākyodāharaṇacchadmamātreṣu pāṇiniprabhṛtipraṇīteṣu prātiśākhyānīva prayogaśāstrāṇīti cet | na | teṣāṃ padasvarūpeṣveva vyāpārāt | pāṇinīyādiṣu hi vedasvarūpavarjitāni padānyeva saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtyotsṛjyante | prātiśākhyaiḥ punarvedasaṃhitādhyayanānugatasvarasaṃdhiprayativivṛtipūrvāṅgaparāṅgādyanusaraṇādvedāṅgatvamāviṣkṛtam |

brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇo dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgo vedo 'dhyeyama. bhā. paspaśāhnike | iti vihito jñāne dharmaḥ śāstrapūrvaprayoge 'bhyudaya iti ca vyāhatābhidhānam | yadapi ca śabdāpaśabdajñānalāghavaṃ prayojanatvenopadiṣṭaṃ tannirākṛtaprayojanāntarasya lāghavamātramevāvaśiṣyata iti satyamevoktam |

lokaprasiddhānāmeva śabdānāmatyantaviṣamadhātugaṇoṇādisūtrādibhiralaukikasaṃjñāparibhāṣānibaddhaprakriyairanavasthitasthāpanākṣepasiddhāntavicāraiḥ kleśenāntaṃ gatvā yathāvasthitā
nuvādamātrameva kriyate, tatrāpi codāharaṇavyatirikteṣu kasyacideva lakṣaṇayojanasāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate | tenātyantaguruḥ sannayamupāyastutyarthameva laghurityupacaritaḥ | yadapi kena ciduktam—
tadrūparasagandhasparśeṣvapi vaktavyamāsīt |
ata eva ślokasyottarārdhaṃ vaktavyam |
na hyatra kaścidvipratipadyate badhireṣvevamadṛṣṭatvāt |

yataḥ padārthasaṃdehāstāvadbahavo vṛddhavyavahārādeva nivarttante | śeṣāśca nigamaniruktakalpasūtratarkābhiyuktebhyaḥ sarveṣāmarthapratipādanaparatvāt | vyākaraṇena punaratantrīkṛtyārthaṃ padasvarūpamātre 'nvākhyāyamāne dūrādapetamevārthajñānam | tathā hi—
‘gamerḍoḥ’uṇādisū. 235 | ityetadvayutpattyanusārī hi gantṛmātrameva gośabdavācyamadhyavasyet | jātiśabdaścāyaṃ vṛddhavyavahāre 'vasthito yatra prasiddhastatrānvākhyātavyaḥ | tathā ca—

‘kalerḍhak’pā. sū. (4—2—8) ‘vāmadevāḍḍyaḍḍyau’ itipā. sū. (4—2—9) | kalivāmadevadṛṣṭasāmābhidhānapratipattirvaiyākaraṇasya
bhavati | vede tu “tato vasu vāmaṃ samabhavat tasmādvāmadevyam” “yadakālayattatkāleyasya kāleyatvam” ityādyarthavyutpattidarśanaṃ vyākaraṇānusāriṇīṃ pratipattiṃ bādhate | tathā kalpasūtrakāraiḥ kṛṣṇaśaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇavalakṣe ajine ityevamādiṣu kṛṣṇadaśādivivaraṇāśrayaṇādvayākaraṇaśatenāpyanavagatā arthā vedārthavitparamparāprāptā vedavākyapaurvāparyāvagatayūpādiśabdārthāśca vyākhyāyante | yathā caivamādiṣu vyākaraṇānapekṣāṇāmeva niḥsaṃśayārthapratipattistathā sthūlapṛṣatyādiśabdārtheṣvapi vyākhyātṛparamparaiva nirṇayakṣameti na vyākaraṇamapekṣitavyam | kiṃ ca—

lg.l: vākyārtheṣu ca saṃdehā jāyante ye sahastraśaḥ |

div.p: yadi vedārthāsaṃdehaprayojanaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhavettataḥ kimarthavādāḥ svatantrāḥ kaṃcidarthaṃ pratipādayantyatha vidhiśeṣabhūtāḥ | tathā kimūrgavarodhanamaudumbaratvasya phalamuta praśaṃsārthamupāttamiti | tathā hetuvidhihetvarthavādamantraprayogadṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvādiṣu grahaikatvavivakṣādiṣu ca saṃdehānapanayet | athaivamādiṣu mīmāṃsāsiddhatvādvayākaraṇe 'nupanyāsastataḥ kalpasūtrakāravacanasiddhakatipayasthūlapṛṣatyādyarthanirṇayaprayojanatā sutarāṃ nā ' 'śrayaṇīyā | api ca—
‘vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattiḥ’ma. bhā. (pratyāhārāhanike laṇsūtre) ityanayaiva paribhāṣayā na hi saṃdehādalakṣaṇamitivanna hi saṃdehādaveda ityapi śakyaṃ vaktum |

lg.l: vyākhyātuṃ śakyate vedo yataḥ syāttena niścayaḥ ||
na ca loke prayuktānāṃ padānāṃ dṛśyate svaraḥ |

div.p: vṛddhavyavahārādhīnaṃ śabdārthāvadhāraṇaṃ tatra ca samāsāntodāttatvapūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvādiprayogavibhāgābhāvānna tatkṛtā 'rthaviśeṣavyavasthā |
vyākaraṇānugamo 'pi cāsya yadi nāma kathaṃcittadupayogārtha eva bhavennatu lokikaprayogārthaḥ| atyantāprayuktatvāt |

tasmādasaṃdehārthamapi nādhyeyaṃ vyākaraṇam | na hyetadarthaniścayāṅgabhūtasvaraviśeṣaprayogotpattiśāstram | yānyapi ca ‘imāni bhūyaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni’ ityevamupanyastāni teṣāmapi kānicitprayojanatvayogyānyeva na saṃbhavanti, kānicitprayojanābhāsāni, kānicidapramāṇakāni | api ca—

tatra yastāvatte 'surā ityādyasurapurākalpārthavādaprakrame 'paśabdapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanatvenopanyastaḥ sa yathāvasthitastathoktaṃ prāk | duṣṭaḥ śabda ityatrāpi bahujanaprasiddhaśikṣākārapaṭhitamantrapadoddhāreṇa śabdapadaṃ prakṣipatā svapakṣānurāgo darśitaḥ | duṣṭamantraprayoge tviṣyata eva yajamānasya pratyavāyaḥ | ‘yaddhotā jahāti vāgghi tadyajamānaṃ jahāti’ ityevamādibhiḥ sarvartvik‌prayojyamantravināśeṣu yajamānagāmidoṣadarśanāt | tathā ca ‘indraśatrurvardhasva’ iti mantraprayogavināśadoṣa evodāhṛtaḥ | yattu nirukte ‘yadadhītamavijñātaṃ nigadenaiva śabdyate’anagnāviva śuṣkaidho na tajjvalati karhiciditi śeṣaḥ | ityuktaṃ, tadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra evārthaśabdaṃ vyācakṣāṇaiḥ snānasmṛtyatikramakāraṇatvenopavarṇitam | ‘anatikrāmanto vedamarthavantaṃ santamanarthakamavakalpayema, dṛṣṭo hi tasyārthaḥ karmāvabodhanam’ iti | tataścāvyākhyātena vedenārthaprakāśanākaraṇāt ‘na tajjvalati karhi cit’ iti | satyamevaitat | na tu vyākaraṇasya tatropayogaḥ | karmaprayogotpattiṃ pratyaśāstratvāt | śabdaśāstrametaditi cetteṣvapyapūrvoktena nirmūlatvena na vyavasthā syāt tasmātkalpasūtraniruktamīmāṃsānāmevādhītamantrabrāhmaṇārthavijñānopayogakṣamatvādetatprayojanaṃ yuktaṃ, na tu vyākaraṇasya | yastu prayuṅkte kuśalo śabdānyathāvavdyavahārakāle | so 'nantamāpnoti jayaṃ paratra vāgyogavidduṣyati cāpaśabdaiḥ | ma. bhā. |yastu prayuṅkta itye
tadapi mantrabrāhmaṇaśabdasya samyakprayogaprayojanameva vijñāyate | yathāsamāmnātādanyathākaraṇācca “duṣyati cāpaśabdaiḥ” iti | svādhyāyādhyayanādhyāpanayajanayājanagatavedaśabdavināśe 'pi ‘yadṛkto yajña ārtimiyāt‘ ita | etadvacanādavagatadoṣānuvādo 'pītyavagamyate | vāgyogaviditi ca bahulokavyavahāradarśanādviditapadapadārthasaṃbandhaḥ pumān, brāhmaṇavākyeṣu coddiśyamānopādīyamānaguṇapradhānādinirūpaṇāvadhṛtavacanavyaktiviśeṣo mantreṣu cāvagatacoditācoditasvārthaparārthaprakāśanārhatvānarhatvavideva ca vāgyogavidityucyate na vaiyākaraṇaḥ | vaiyākaraṇasyaivaṃvidhaprayogotpattyaśāstratvāt | yadapyavidvāṃsaavidvāṃsaḥ pratyabhivāde nāmno ye na plutiṃ vidaḥ | kāmaṃ teṣu tu viproṣya strīṣvivāyamahaṃ vadet | iti mahābhāṣye vyākaraṇasya strīsāmyaparihāraprayojanatvakathanārthamupanyastaḥ ślokaḥ | iti, pratyabhivāde nāmāntyasvaraplutānabhijñanindāvacanaṃ, tatplutasya trimātrasya lokaprasiddhatvānmanvādyupadiṣṭanāmāntyaprayogasiddhau labdhāyāṃ tatprayogotpattyaśāstratvam | na ca tāvatā manvādibhiranena codāhṛtena ślokena prakṛtipratyayādivibhāgadvāreṇa śabdāpaśabdavivekajñāna tadupayogo vā ' 'śrīyate | yacca ‘prayājāḥ savibhaktikāḥ kartavyāḥ’ iti tadyājñikopadeśasiddhatvād brāhmaṇe ca ṣaḍahavibhaktayaḥ “agnirvṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat” “agniṃ vo vṛtrahantamam” ‘agninā 'gniḥ samidhyate’ ityevamādivibhaktavibhaktiprayogadarśanādantareṇāpi vyākaraṇaṃ vaibhaktikamātrālocanenāpi vā savibhaktikaprayājaprayogasiddheraśāstraṃ vyākaraṇam | “yo vā imāṃ padaśaḥ svaraśo vācaṃ vidadhāti sa ārtvijīno bhavati”ṛ. saṃ. (2—3—22) | iti samyagvedādhyāyyevamabhidhīyate | tathā “catvāri vākparimitā padāni” iti yāni tāvadoṃkāramahāvyāhṛtyādicatuṣṭayabāhulyaprayojanānusaraṇena nairuktairapyakṣaravarṇasāmyānnirbrūyāditivatprapañcitāni, na tatra vyākaraṇasya kaścidadhikāraḥ | yattu nāmākhyātopasarganipātacatuṣṭayānugataṃ vaiyākaraṇamatamāśritaṃ tadapi catuṣṭayasya lokasiddhatvādeva nātīva vyākaraṇāpekṣam | etadviṣayatve ca varṇyamāne “turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti” ityasaṃbaddhameva syāt | caturṇāmapi padajātānāṃ manuṣyairucyamānatvāt | tasmādayamasya mantrasyārthaḥ paurvāparyasaṃgato varṇyate | “catvāri vākparimitā padāni” iti yairvākpadyate gamyate tāni catvāri pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattyākhyāni pramāṇānyabhidhīyante | tatra yāni pratīkavidhiprākṛtavaikṛtavākyasārūpyadṛṣṭānupapadyamānādiprabhavairanumānopamānārthāpattyākhyaistribhirgamyante, tāni tatsiddhatvādeva neṅgayanti noccārayanti | yastu bhāgastairaśakyaḥ pratipādayituṃ taṃ turīyaṃ pratyakṣasamadhigamyamadhyetāro manuṣyā vadanti samāmanantītyarthaḥ | ṣaṭpramāṇīmadhyācca pramāṇadvayaṃ vākpadatvādapoddha‍ṛtam | abhāvastāvadabhāvaviṣayatvādeva vākpadaṃ na bhavati | āgamasya punarvāgātmakatvātpadyamānavāgāśritasya padatvāśrayaṇamanupa
pannam | pratyakṣapakṣanikṣiptatvātpṛthaktvenānirdeśaḥ | ṛ. saṃ. (3 |8 | 10) |catvāri śṛṅgetyasya tu viṣuvati hoturājye prayuktasya yo 'rthaḥ sa mantrādhikaraṇe vyākhyātaḥ | na cātra kācidvyākaraṇāpekṣā | yattu catvāri padajātāni śṛṅgāṇītyevamādisaṃkhyāsāmānyamātreṇa karmaviniyogānapekṣamarthāntaraṃ varṇyate, tadvayākaraṇakṛtavākvauśalamātram | tādṛśaṃ ca vaiśeṣikādiṣvapi tadabhiyuktaiḥ śakyaṃ yojayitumityanādaraṇīyam | “utatvaḥ paśyan”ṛ. saṃ. (8 |2 23) | ityapi lokaniruktakalpasūtramīmāṃsāśrayotpannapadārthavākyārthajñānapraśaṃsārtha eva mantro vijñāyamāno na vyākaraṇamadriyate | evaṃ “saktumiva titaünā”ṛ. saṃ. (8 | 2 | 22) | ityeṣo 'pyaviplutasvādhyāyādhyayananirmalavedākṣarārthajñānapraśaṃsārthaṃ pūrvavadeva varṇanīyaḥ | “āhitāgnirapaśabdaṃ prayujya”ma. bhā. paspaśāhnike | iti, vyākhyātamevaitat | yadapi nāmakaraṇe, ghoṣavadādyantarantasthaṃavṛddhaṃ tripuruṣānūkamanaripratiṣṭitaṃ taddhi pratiṣṭhitatamaṃ bhavati iti śeṣaḥ ma. bhā. paspa. | dvicaturādivarṇakṛdantaparigrahataddhitavarjanavacanaṃ, tatkṛttaddhitasaṃjñayorvyākaraṇe 'pi pūrvaprasiddhayorevopādānādvarṇaparimāṇasya ca pratyakṣapūrvakasmṛtyadhīnatvād ghoṣavattvādīnāṃ ca śikṣāprātiśākhyeṣvanukramaṇātsarvaiśca śrotriyairakleśena nāmakaraṇānna vyākaraṇaṃ nāma prayogotpattiśāstratvenāpekṣaṇīyam | “sudevoasi varuṇa”ṛ. saṃ. (6 | 5 | 7) | ityatra yadyapi tāvatsapta vibhaktasya eva sapta sindhava iti vyākhyāyante tathā 'pi tāsāṃ vibhaktisaṃjñāmātraṃ vyākaraṇena kriyate prasiddhameva vā gṛhyate | yāni tu prayogarūpāṇi tāni loke vede ca vibhāgaśaḥ pratyakṣāṇyeveti na vyākaraṇāpekṣayaivamabhidhīyante | yadā punaḥ sapta sindhavo nadya eva yajñartvigyajamānapraśaṃsāpakṣe vā sapta hotrāgatā vācaḥ sapta sāmasvaragatāstadbhaktiṃgatā vā parigṛhyante, tadaitihāsikayājñikagocarāpannatvādaviṣaya eva vyākaraṇasya |

lg.l: vaktavyaḥ kasya saṃskāraḥ kathaṃ vā kriyate punaḥ ||

div.p: vyākaraṇena śabdeṣu saṃskriyamāṇeṣu na jñāyate kiṃ vastu saṃskriyate ko vā saṃskāra utpattiprāptivikārāpūrvasādhanasāmarthyādhānānāṃ kriyata iti |
etena varṇavyaktisaṃskāraḥ pratyuktaḥ |
yeṣāṃ tāvadvarṇavyaktayaḥ pradhvaṃsinya eva teṣāṃ vinaṣṭānutpannānāṃ saṃskārāyogyatvameva |

lg.l: na ca tāṃ saṃskṛtāṃ bhūyaḥ kaścana drakṣyati kvacit |

div.p: yathaiva homasaṃskṛtānāṃ bhasmasādbhāvātsaktūnāṃ punardarśanaviniyogāsaṃbhavād‌dvitīyāpratipāditasaṃskāryatvaparigrahe saktavo homastadbhāvanāvidhiriti sarveṣāmanarthakatvaṃ prasajyata iti saṃskārānāśrayaṇaṃ, tathaiva kṣaṇikaśabdavyaktisaṃskārapakṣe sarvānarthakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | tataśca yo 'pyayamaniyamo 'bhihito yadyevaṃ nityaḥ śabdo 'thāpi kārya ubhayathā 'pi lakṣaṇaṃ pravartyamiti sa evameva nyāyamirūpaṇabhayamātrāviṣkaraṇārthaḥ śiṣyavyāmohanārtho veti na yuktaḥ parigrahītum |
vyākaraṇaprakriyānugṛhītena vaiyākaraṇenotpādyamāneṣu sādhuśabdeṣu nityavedamūlatvavedāṅgatvanirākaraṇaṃ svayamevā ' 'pāditam |

lg.l: tādṛśasya ca saṃskāro na śakyo nopayujyate ||
na ca sthalavadārambho varṇaiḥ śabdasya kasya cit |
yena tatsaṃskṛtiḥ sidhyetsa hi pūrvaṃ nirākṛtaḥ ||
atha tricaturā varṇāḥ saṃskriyante pade pade |

div.p: vakṣyati hi—
kartṛguṇe tu karmāsamavāyādvākyabhedaḥ syāditijai. sū. ( 3—1—10 ) | |

lg.l: nāmākhyātādiādiśabdena nipātopasargayoḥ parigrahaḥ | saṃskāryaṃ teṣāṃ śaśaviṣāṇavat ||
śṛṅgaṃ śaśādapoddhṛtya kiṃ na saṃskriyate manāk ||

div.p:
iti bahuprapañcamuktvā kevalasya cāprayogādarthaprayuktatvaṃ nirākṛtya vākyānvākhyānārthameva vyākaraṇamapi vyākhyānaṃ yuktamāsīttadanāśrayaṇāttu sūtravārtikabhāṣyakāravadeva
pūrvāparaviruddhamabhidadhānaiṣṭīkākārairapi sutarāṃ vyākaraṇasyāpratyayitapuruṣapraṇītatvaṃ darśitam |
tataśca—
tena sarvairbhāṣitavyaṃ sarve sādhava iti | atrānumānaprayogāḥ—

lg.l: vakturvaktuḥ puro vṛtteḥ śakyaṃ vaktuṃ gavādivat ||

div.p: yathā hi cakṣurādigrahaṇānapekṣarūpādivijñānasiddhau tajjanitārthāpattiprabhavaṃ cakṣurādyanumānamupajātamapi na pūrvajñānasyāṅgamevaṃ lokavedasiddhaśabdaprayogottarakālapraṇītatayā vyākaraṇamapyanaṅgam |
evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate—
dṛḍhaviparyayajñānānantaraṃ sahasaiva ca samyagjñānotpādātibhārādbhāraikadeśāvatāraṇārthaṃ saṃśayotthāpanāmātrameva tāvadyuktam | atha vā—

yadi hyekāntena yādṛśaḥ paramukhācchabdaḥ śrūyate tādṛgeva sarveṇa sarvadoccāryeta tato vṛddhavyavahāraparamparāyāṃ satyāṃ gavādibhiriva na gāvyādibhiḥ kaścidapi kālaḥ śūnya āsīdityadhyavasāyādanāditvamaṅgīkriyeta | aparādhajasya śabdasya saṃbhavāttu tadāśaṅkāyāṃ satyāṃ naikāntataḥ sarveṣāmanāditvam | prayatnaniṣpatteriti pūrvoktanyāyāvadhāritaprayatnābhivyaktireva hetutvenopadiśyate | apara āha | aprayatnaniṣpatteraparādhasya bhāgiteti | yo hyaskhalitaprayatnaḥ śabdamabhivyanakti tasya paramparāgataśabdoccāraṇamātrātsarve samānavidhānā bhaveyuḥ | yadā tvaprayatnaniṣpattirapi śabde saṃbhāvyate tadā tatrāparādhajarūpāntarāpattiprasaṅgānna niyogataḥ sarvaśabdānāṃ samānavidhānatvam | atha vā śabdaviṣayasya prayatnasyaiva yā niṣpattistasyāmaparādhaḥ sunipuṇānāmapyavikalakaraṇānāṃ dṛśyate kimutānipuṇaviguṇakaraṇānām—
loke 'pi ca—

lg.l: tathā sati ca tada‍dvārā siddhiḥ śabdāpaśabdayoḥ ||
arthasatyaṃ yathā vācyaṃ śabdasatyaṃ tathaiva hi |

div.p: atha vā yaduktam |

yadi hi sādhuḥ prayujyamāno na kaścitkadācidapi vinaśyettatastasya nityaprāptatvānnivartyāpaśabdāprāpteśca niyamaśāstramanarthakaṃ bhavet | yadā tvaparādhabhāgitve sati dvayorapyaniyatā prāptistadā sādhuniyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasya na viṣayavyāghātaḥ | eka evāyaṃ śabdaḥ puruṣāśaktipramādakāraṇādibhedāttāṃ tāṃ varṇanyūnātirekakramānyatvādyavasthāmanupataṃstena tenāpabhraṃśarūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇastamevārthaṃ pratipādayatīti na paryāyakalpanayā vācakaśabdāntaratvaikāntasiddhiḥ | kiṃ ca |
tattādiśabdādapi hi bālaprayuktāttadanukārikaṭhorabuddhiprayuktādvā devadattādyarthapratyayamupalabhamānaḥ kathamiva prayogapratyayadarśakābhyāmeva vācakatvamadhyavasyet |

katiṣucideva gāvyādiṣu cirāpabhraṣṭatvādrūḍhayāśaṅkayā sādhutvabhrāntirbhavet | ye tu saṃpratyeva jaḍaprāyajñānakaraṇairabhinavagāvyādirūpeṇa vināśyaśabdāḥ prayujyamānāḥ prakṛtyanusaraṇadvāreṇa vā 'rthaṃ pratyāpayanta upalabhyante teṣvapi prayogapratyayadarśanamastītyanaikāntikatā |

lg.l: vācako 'yaṃ na vetyevaṃ sati vā 'nyena nirṇayaḥ || 25 ||

div.p: saṃśayāpādanātparapakṣe jite 'pi svapakṣasiddhirdurlabhaivetyevamarthamuttarasūtram—anyāyaścāneka śabdattvamiti | kathaṃ punaridamanyāyyam | taducyate—
ekātmakayoreva hi vācyavācakayoranyonyākṣepātparasparaniyamaḥ saṃbhavatyanyatarasyāpi tvanekatve sati vyabhicārānniyamahāniḥ | kiṃ ca—
atyantādṛṣṭā hi vācyapratyayānyathānupapattimātrapramāṇikā vācakaśaktirekatraiva kalpitā tadanusāryapabhraṃśeṣvapi cedanugamyate ko nāma tannirapekṣavācakaśaktyantarakalpanāṃ labheta |
kiṃ ca—
yathā ca prakṛtisārūpyadvāreṇāpabhraṃśāḥ prākṛtīmeva śaktimāvirbhāvayanto 'rthapratipattāvupayogaṃ gacchantiṃ tathā jai. sū. ( 1—3—8 ) |tadaśaktiścānurūpatvādityatra varṇayiṣyate |
tulyaprayogapratipattīnāmanyatarāvadhāraṇamaśakyāmiti cedata āha—tatra tattvamabhiyogaviśeṣātsyāditi | kaḥ punarabhiyogaḥ ko vā tadviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ vā tena vācakatvanirūpaṇamiti | taducyate—
pratipadapāṭho hyānantyādatyantāśakyastadabhāve ca lakṣaṇānusaraṇamevaikamaśeṣalakṣyanirūpaṇakṣamatvenāvadhāryate |

tenobhayajñānasyāpi vyākaraṇamevopāya iti tadgatābhiyogaviśeṣāśrayaṇam | yattu prayogotpattiśāstratvāditi lakṣaṇe tanmūlāsaṃbhavāditaretarāśrayatvamuktaṃ tallokavyavahāraprasiddhapratipādakatvamātreṇānirṇītapāramārthikavācakatvairapi vyākaraṇāvayavabhūtaiḥ padaiḥ keṣāṃcitsādhutvamanvākhyāya punastairapyanvākhyāpakaśabdasādhutvanirṇayātparihariṣyate |
tena saṃkīrṇāsaṃkīrṇavācakajñānopāyatvāllokavyākaraṇayorbhinnaviṣayatvenāpunaruktatā, vede sādhuśabdamātradarśanādanarthakaṃ vyākaraṇamiti cet | na | akṛtsnaviṣayatvāt |
yathaiva laukikapratipadapāṭhasyāśakyatvamevaṃ vede 'pi sarvaśākhāgatānsakṛdapi śrotumaśaktiḥ kimutādhyetum |

etena puruṣārthakratvarthādṛṣṭasādhuśabdaprayogajñānasādhyasādhanabhāvavidhivākyagatapadavyākriyā tasyāśca pūrvaprasiddhatanmūlatvakalpanāgatetaretarāśrayatvaprasaṅgaḥ pratyuktaḥ | yadi hyekāntena “tasmānna brāhmaṇena bhlecchitavai” “ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyagjñātaḥ suprayuktaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati” tai. saṃ. ( 6—4—7 )“tasmādeṣā vyākṛtā vāgudyate” iti caivamādikratupuruṣagataniyamavidhidarśanottarakālameva vyākaraṇena pravartitavyamiti paurvāparyavyavasthā bhavettata evaṃ paryanuyogaḥ prasajyetāpi vyākṛtatvāśrayo vedavidhirvedavidhyāśrayaṃ ca vyākaraṇaṃ kathamavakalpiṣyata iti | yadā tu kiṃcidgranthopanibaddhaprakṛtipratyayādivibhāgadvāraprakriyātmakavyākaraṇasmṛtivarjitakālābhāvādanvākhyānānvākhyeyānvākhyātavidhiprayogānanvākhyātapratiṣedhavarjanaṣaṭkasyāpyavagamyamānavedavidhimūlatvādanāditve sati sarveṣāṃ vedavediyūpāhavanīyādhvaryugodohanādisvarūpatatkāryatatsādhanavidhīnāmiva sarvadā 'navagatapūrvāparavibhāgasaṃba
ndhe 'tyantādṛṣṭārthatvameva kevalaṃ śāstrapratyayādhīnaṃ, tadā sarvakālavyākriyamāṇavidyamānaśabdaniyamavidherna kiṃcidanupapannam | yattu vācakatvāvācakatvavyatiriktasādhvasādhutābhāvādvācakāvācakatvayośca laukikaprayogapratipattitadviparyayamātraśaraṇatvādgāvyādiśabdānāmavācakatvapratijñāne lokavirodhānna bheryādiśabdamātṛkākṣarapāṭhaprasiddhanyūnātiriktaviparyastavarṇapadavyatiriktaprasiddhamadhye kaścidapaśabdo nāmāstīti | tatrābhidhīyate—
lokavyākaraṇābhyāṃ hi miśrābhyāmaviplutavācakasiddhiriti tāvadeva lokavyavahārādvācakatvajñānaṃ jāyate yāvadvayākaraṇānugatatvaṃ nābhyupagamyate |

yadā tu tayormārgabhedena pratipattistadā ‘teṣvadarśanādvirodhasya samā vipratipattiḥ syāt’jai0 sū0 ( 1—3—4 ) ityupanyasya ‘śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt’ ityanenaivottareṇa vyākaraṇākhyaśāstragatapratipattibalīyastvaṃ tadabhiyuktapuruṣabalīyastvaṃ vā pūrvameva sthāpitam |
yathaiva tulyaśiraḥpāṇyādyākāreṣvapi saṃkīrṇalokadṛṣṭigrāhyeṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu mātāpitṛsaṃbandhasmaraṇādeva varṇavivekāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati tathā sādhuśabdāvadhāraṇamapīti lokavirodhābhāvaḥ |

yo nāma smṛtipratipādito 'rthaḥ karmaphalasaṃbandhavadaniyatakālatvānna jñāyate kadā bhaviṣyatīti so 'tyantaṃ pratyakṣādyaviṣayatvātkevalaśāstramūlatvena sthāpyate | yasya tvādau smaraṇajanitaviveke kṛte tadanantarameva pratyakṣamapi vicārābhyāsajanitasaṃskārasya rāgābhyāsajanitaṣaṅjādivibhāgaviṣayamiva sādhvasādhuśabdarūpagocaramupajāyate |

tenāpaśabdagatavācakatvāpādanasyaiva samastapramāṇavirodhaḥ śakyo vaktuṃ na smaryamāṇaśabdasādhutvapakṣasyeti niravadyatā | tenādṛṣṭārthapratyāyananiyamapratiṣedhadvāraṃ dharmādharmasādha
natvakṛtamapi sādhvasādhutvajñānamupapatsyate | yastvāha sādhutvaṃ nendriyagrāhyamityādiślokam | taṃ pratyevaṃ vaktavyam |

grastanirastāmbūkṛtādidoṣavarjitaniyamahrasvādikālābhivyaṅgyayathālakṣitakramagrāhyavarṇānāṃ smaryamāṇāvinaṣṭavācakarūpaviṣayaśrotrajñānenodāttādivadindriyagrāhyatvam | taduttarakālapravṛttavyavahāragatārthapratipattisahitalakṣaṇagataprakṛtipratyayalopāgamavikārādeśādiliṅgamapyavyabhicāri vidyate | śāstrasya ca dvividhasyāpi śrutismṛtirūpasya svargalokayajñopakārasiddhisādhanabhāvapratipādanārthasyārthānarthakāryasvarūpajñānārthasya cāyamevaṃvidha evānyo 'pi viṣayaḥ | avinaṣṭaiḥ śabdairbhāṣamāṇasya svargayajñopakārau bhavataḥ | yājñe ca karmaṇyapaśabdairbhāṣamāṇasyānṛtamiva vadataḥ pratiṣiddhācaraṇanimittakratuvaiguṇyaprasaṅgaḥ | yathoktaṃ “vāgyogavidduṣyati cāpaśabdaiḥ” iti | etau dvāvapyarthau na śāstrādṛte 'nyena pratipādayituṃ śakyete ityatīva śāstraviṣayaḥ | dvāmyāmeva ca vidhipratiṣemyāmavinaṣṭaiḥ śabdaiḥ svargayajñopakārakāmo bhāṣeta na vinaṣṭairiti na pratiśabdāpaśabdamanantavidhipratiṣedhakalpanaprasaṅgaḥ | na ca vidhipratiṣedhaviṣayeṇaiva śāstreṇa bhavitavyaṃ na prameyasvarūpajñāpanārthenetyetadīśvarājñāsiddham | na hi ‘avināśī vā are ayamātmā 'nucchitidharmā’ ityādi, ‘catustriṃśadāścīnāni sarasvatyā vinaśanaplākṣapraśravaṇe’ ityevamādivākyaśeṣāṇāṃ ca śāstragatānāmarthatattvapratipādanaparatvaṃ na labhyate | nāpi tatpratipādane śāstraśabdavācyatvabādhaḥ | athāpi vidhipratiṣedhātmakenaiva śāstreṇa bhavitavyamiti kā citparibhāṣā tathā 'pyevaṃvidhāḥ sādhuśabdāḥ pratyetavyā itīdṛśo vidhiḥ saṃbhavatyeva | yo vākyāntarāvagatādṛṣṭaphalārthī yadyavinaṣṭaiḥ śabdairbhāṣitumicchet sa caitānevaṃrūpānetatkramamāṃtrāṃśca varṇānupādadīta nādhikānna nyūnāṃśceti yāvadrūpaṃ vidhipratiṣedhau śakyau darśayitumiti śāstraviṣayatvasiddhiḥ | niḥsaṃdigdhavṛddhabālaprayuktadevadattatattādiśabdopamayā 'pi ca sarvaśabdānāṃ vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭarūpairavaśyaṃ bhavitavyamiti śakyaṃ vijñātum | evaṃ vyākaraṇānugatavaidikaśabdāvināśasādṛśyādapi tadvidhalaukikāvinaṣṭatvopamānaṃ darśayitavyam | tathā laukikārthapratyayotthāpitavācakatvārthāpattilabhyastāvadekaḥ sādhutvaniścayaḥ | tataḥ saṃbhavatpramādālasyakaraṇavaiguṇyanimittāpabhraṣṭarūpavarjitakevalasādhvanvākhyānasyānyathānupapadyamānatvādaparayā 'pyarthāpattyā siddhameva sādhutvajñānam |

pauruṣeyavyākaraṇāgamaparamparāyāmapi ca tadanugatasādhutvānantaradarśanātpūrvadṛṣṭavivekajñānamātraparatvādvā nāndhaparamparāvacananyāyaprasaṅgaḥ | yāvāniha dṛṣṭārthāṃśaḥ sa vaidikavidhipratiṣedhadvayādevopapannaḥ | tatsiddhayarthāvinaṣṭaśabdarūpājñānaṃ vedaśiṣṭaprayogasaṃvādivyākaraṇānvākhyānapāramparyeṇa sadyaḥ phalatvātsulabhamiti na puruṣakṛtatvanimittadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ | yattu dṛṣṭārthatvātsvasāmarthyaprāptatvādeva jai. sū. ( 6—2—4 ) |‘aprāpte śāstramarthavat’ iti vācakabhāṣaṇavidhānamanupapannamiti tatrādhikaraṇenaivottaraṃ dāsyate jai. sū. ( 4—2—9 ) |‘niyamārthā vā śrutirucyate’ iti | yattvavācakatvenāpaśabdānāmaprasaṅgādvayāvartyābhāve niyamānupapattiriti | tatrocyate—

lg.l: nityatāmātrakārī tu niyamaḥ kiṃ na labhyate ||

div.p: sati bhāṣitavye kadācidavinaṣṭena bhāṣeta kadācitpramādāśaktijāpabhraṃśenāpyakṣinikocanādinā vā śabdarahitenaiva pratyāpayet |

yadyapi ca niyame 'nyanivṛttiravaśyaṃ kalpanīyā tathā 'pi sādhuśabdasmṛtivyavahitānāṃ viprakarṣābhidhāyikālaśabdoktānāmapaśabdānāṃ, rūḍhapadaparāmṛṣṭo yo 'smaryamāṇāvadhidīrghakālaprayogo yaśca rūpaśabdoktamlecchabhāṣaṇavilakṣaṇasādhuśabdasādṛśyātmako 'rthaḥ, tadubhayātmakakāraṇajanyayā bhrāntyā ' 'dhunikairvācakatvena gṛhītānāmityarthaḥ |kālarūḍharūpabhrāntivācakatvagṛhītānāṃ cāpaśabdānāṃ saṃbhavati prayogaprasaṅge sādhuniyamena vyāvṛttiḥ |
atha vā naivāpaśabdānāmapṛthaktve kecidekakriyāviṣayānekadravyaguṇādivadabhidhāyāṃ prāpnuvanti ye sādhuniyamena vyāvartyeran | kiṃ tu |

tadyathā | ‘yo vidagdhaḥ sa nairṛtaḥ’ ityevamādidoṣanindāpūrvakam ‘avidahatā śrapayitavyaḥ’ iti niyamyate | tathā ‘duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ svarato varṇato vā’ ityādinā ninditatvāt, ‘tasmādbrāhmaṇena na mlecchitavai nāpabhāṣitavai mleccho ha vā eṣa yadapaśabdaḥ’ iti pramādādinimittavināśena śabdakāryādarthasādhanādapeto 'yaṃ mlecchaḥ, pā. dhā.
