vaidikasya vākyasya vaidika eva śeṣaḥ pūraṇakṣamo na laukikaḥ | codanālakṣaṇadharmaniyamāt | yadā tu vedaḥ sarvātmanā 'nviṣyamāṇo 'pi tyaktavyāpāro dṛśyate tadā laukikamapyanujānāti | sā vā 'nveṣaṇā yathāsaṃnikarṣaṃ pravartate | tatra |

ekasminnarthe sākāṅkṣe 'bhihite prakṛtyā pratyayena vā tatsaṃbandhasamarthamarthāntaraṃ yadi vā tatraiva dṛśyate tato ramaṇīyam | atha na dṛśyate tataḥ pramādālasye parityajya prakṛtau pratyaye cānveṣṭavyaḥ | tayorapi cenna dṛśyate tataḥ purastātparastādvā 'nantaroccarite padāntare | na cedanantare labhyetaikāntaravdyantarādivyavahite | yadi tu svavākye na labhyeta tatastenaiva krameṇa prakṛte vākyāntare | vākyāntare 'pi tvalabhyamāno yathopasthāpyamānānusāreṇa
prakaraṇāntare | yadā tu tatrāpi na labhyate tadā loke | loke 'pi cennopalabhyeta tato nāstītyevamavadhāryā ' 'kāṅkṣābuddhiṃ bhrāntitvena parikalpya nirākāṅkṣīkartavyam | sarvatra ca |

tadiha rajāśayāharāśayāvākyayoḥ śeṣaḥ svapadasvavākyayoralabhyamānatvādvākyāntare nūnamityupasaṃhriyate | sa ca yādṛgākāṅ‌kṣitastādṛgevaikānantaraṃ purastādupalabhyate 'nyasya vyavahitaḥ | yadyapi cāsau prathamamantre kṛtārthatvānna tāvākāṅkṣati tau tu tena vinā 'nupapadyamānāvātmasamīpe 'nyasyānām‍nānādevaṃ puruṣaṃ prayuñjāte | sarvasamīpe sakṛtpaṭhitumaśakyaḥ pramāṇāntaralabhyatvācca punaḥ punaraśrāvito 'yamāvayorapyarthenā ' 'm‍nātaḥ śeṣo naikasyaiva saṃnidhiviśeṣanimittabhrāntyā kalpayitavya iti | yadyapi ca purastādāmnāyate, tathā 'pi yatpradeśavarttitvena tābhyāṃ kāṅ‌kṣitastatraiva viniyujyate | kutaḥ |

sa hi sakṛdām‍nāyamānaḥ sarveṣāmīpsite pradeśe na śakya ām‍nātumityekasya yathākramamām‍nāta itarayośca yāvatā buddhiviṣayatāmāpadyate, tataśca gṛhītaḥ san svayamapi pradeśāntare sthātumasamarthastābhyāmapi cānyavṛttitvenānākāṅ‌kṣitaḥ pūrvatra ca parastādbhāvitayā dṛṣṭasāmarthyaḥ parastādeva nivekṣyate | bhāṣyakāreṇa tu prathamadvitīyayormadhye pāṭhādaguhyamāṇaviśeṣaḥ śeṣa ubhayorapyānantaryeṇaiva saṃbandhītyutkvā tṛtīyasya vyavadhānādasaṃbandhamāśaṅkyārthitvāviśeṣādubhayoḥ samudāyāpādanenāvyavadhāne sādhite samudāyaśeṣatvameva tarhi prāpnotītyāśaṅkya tasyāprayogārhatvātprayogārhasamudāyisaṃbandhaḥ, tatrāpi tayoḥ prādhānyādanyathā ca nairākāṅkṣyānupapatteḥ pratyekaṃ sakalaśeṣasaṃbandhasiddhirityabhidhāya punarvyākhyānāntaramārabdham—api ca sākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhāviti | tatra kaiści
vdyākhyānavikalpa evetyāśritam | apare tu vadanti pūrvatrāparitoṣāduttaraṃ kṛtam | kiṃ kāraṇam |

lg.l: punaḥ pratyekanirmāṇe na ca hetuḥ pratīyate ||

div.p: samudāyatvaṃ hyekakāryatvenaikaśabdopādānena vā bhavet, na cātraikamapyasti | nanvidamekakāryatvamekavākyaśeṣagrahaṇaṃ nāma | aho nu khalu mantrāṇāṃ kāryaṃmantrāṇāṃ kratvaṅgaprakāśanamevakāryaṃ nattvekaśeṇagrahaṇamityarthaḥ | vijñātam | apekṣā hi tatrobhayoḥ syāt | kathaṃ tatkāryamityucyate | śeṣaścāsau tayorna tadvaśena samudāyatvāpattiryuktā | paścādapi vā samudāyibhyāmeva tasya saṃgatiriṣṭetyādita eva samudāyatvaṃ na labhyate | yadi ca samudāyatvamāpannau tataḥ punaḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbandha iti rājaikaputrakrīḍāekapusyātyaṃta priyattvena pitṛbhyāmanivāraṇādrājaputrattvena cānyairapyanivāraṇādatyantānyāyyā yathā tatheyamapīti dṛṣṭānta bhāgāśayaḥ | ' 'padyate | purastādeva ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti | tathābhūtena samudāyānantaryāt | na vā 'gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvaṃ, deśabhedanimittatantrabhedāt | prathamasya hyasau yathākāṅ‌kṣite deśe sthito nottarayoḥ | tasmādidameva vyākhyānam |

lg.l: ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhānaṃ ca yogyatā ceti ca trayam |

div.p: yo hi bahūnāṃ saṃbandhitvena sakṛdām‍nāyate tasyāvaśyaṃbhāvyekenā ' 'nantaryamiti na tadeva tadā saṃbandhakāraṇatvenā ' 'śrīyate | tatrāpyasmādeva kāraṇatrayātsaṃbandhasiddheḥ | saṃnidhiviśeṣāttu tadāśrayapratipattyā bhavati bhrāntiḥ | sā tu sākāṅkṣayogyasaṃnihitasaṃbandhyantaradarśanānnivartate | yathā dhātvarthādiṣu vidhibuddhirguṇādyupādānasāmarthyāt | evaṃ hi tatra jñāyate | sarvārtho 'yamām‍nāyamānaḥ sarvasādhāraṇānantaryāsaṃbhavādvākyaikatvācca kasyacidekasya samīpe paṭhyate | tasmādakāraṇamānantaryamiti | saṃnidhiriti—buddhau viparivṛttiḥ | sā cā ' 'nantarye saṃbaddhapadavyavāye ca bhavati | saṃbaddhapadavyavadhirapyānantaryaprakāra eva | katham |

‘yā te agne rajāśayā’ ityanenāpekṣitaḥ śeṣaḥ parastādalabhyamānaḥ purastātparāvṛ
ttyā ' 'locyamāno labhyate tanūrvarṣiṣṭheti | yadā ca tatrā ' 'rūḍhastadā harāśayetyasyānantarībhūtaḥ punarevameva tṛtīyenāpi saha saṃbadhyate | tataḥ paraṃ tvanyasyānām‍nānāttāvatyevopakṣīyate | sarvatraivamapekṣā purastātparastācca prasṛtaikatrā ' 'ruhyetareṣāmanantarībhavantī tāvadapekṣyamāṇā nigṛhṇāti yāvatkiṃcinna yogyamastyayogyaṃ copalabdham | tataḥ sarvamālocitamupasaṃhṛtya nivartate | yadyapi ca krameṇoccāraṇātsaṃnikarṣaviprakarṣau pratīyete tathā 'pi nityatvādvedasyānantare dūrasthe ca yugapadapekṣā saṃbandhaśceti paścādavagamānna prāmāṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ | evaṃ vākye padānāṃ prakaraṇe ca vākyānāṃ saṃbandho yāvatsākāṅkṣeṇa tatsaṃbandhārheṇa parasyāpyanantarīkartuṃ samarthena vyavadhānam | avyavadhāne vicchede 'pīti | virodhinā padenāvyavadhāne viprakṛṣṭatve bhavati saṃbandhaṃ ityarthaḥ | tasmādanuṣaṅgaḥ samāptiḥ | anuṣajyata ityanuṣaṅgaḥ | sa eva samāpyate teneti samāptiḥ |

yatra tāvaccheṣiṇaḥ sākāṅkṣāstatraivamatha yatra nairākāṅkṣyaṃ sarveṣu śeṣiṣvekaḥ śeṣaḥdvayorapyasaṃbaddhaiṃriti bhāṣyaṃ pūrvabhāṣyeṇagatārthamiva bhāsamānaṃ, vyavahitasyāpyanuṣaṃgābhyupagame sarvatra tatsaṃbhavānnādhyāhāraḥ kvacitsyādityāśaṅkānirāsārthattvenāsaṃbaddhapadāvyavāya evā ' 'kāṅkṣāvatva eva cānuṣaṅgo bhavati nānyatheti parisaṃkhyārtha draṣṭavyam |
sākāṅa‍kṣaḥ paṭha‍yate | yathā ‘citpatistvā punātu’ ityeteṣāmante “acchidreṇa” ityādistatra kathamiti | kiṃ prāptam |
ucyate |

ānantaryaviśeṣeṇa hyayaṃ punātvityetena saṃbadhyate | sa caika eva triṣvapi vākyeṣu, tadekatvārccāthasyāpyekatvam | na ca kārakabhedāttasya bhedo bhavati | yena citpatyādisaṃbaddhādasyānanyatvaṃ vijñāyate | na cācchidreṇetyevamarthā kriyā, yena sakṛtsaṃbandhena saṃtuṣyet |

athocyata ekatve 'pyasyā yatkartṛviśiṣṭābhyāsādyaḥ karaṇasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate tadviśiṣṭaiva tena yojayitavyā | yathaikasyāpi jyotiṣṭomasya maitrāvaruṇagrahābhyāsaviśiṣṭasya payasā
śrayaṇaṃ coditaṃ nātiprasajyate, yathā cātraiva citpatyādayo, na sarve sarvatra bhavanti | ucyate |

aindravāyavādigrahābhyāsānāmadṛṣṭārthatvāttadbhedena śrayaṇavyavasthā yuktā | na hi tathā kiṃcitkāraṇamasti | karaṇasya kriyāṃ pratyupayuktatvāt | karaṇaprakāśanadvāreṇa saiva kriyā punaḥ prakāśyate | sā ca sarvatrāviśiṣṭatvātprakāśanamapekṣate | yathā ca vākpatyupādānāttatsamānavyāpāraścitpatirnivartate, naivamacchidrapavitrapratiyogikaraṇāntaraśravaṇamasti yenaitannivarteta, na ca kartṛprayuktaṃ karaṇam | yatastadbhedādva‍yavatiṣṭheta, kārakāṇāṃ kriyākṣiptatvena parasparasaṃbandhābhāvāt | nanvevamapi mantrāntaramatenāpi punātuśabdenāsya saṃbandhaḥ syāt | naiṣa doṣaḥ | darśapūrṇamāsabarhirdharmavadva‍yavasthāsiddhiḥ | iha prakramya punātuśabdasya yatkāryaṃ tatprayuktamacchidrādiviśeṣaṇaṃ mantratraye 'pi tadekamiti pratyakṣamavagacchāmaḥ | na mantrāntare, karmāntaragatadravyāntarasaṃskārārthatvāt | nanvevaṃ satyekakāryatvānmantravikalpaḥ prasajyeta | vibhāgamantravadiṣṭāpattyā ' 'śaṅkāṃ pariharati kuto vetyādinā | samuccayaprāhakapramāṇābhāvādyukta eva vikalpa ityāśayaḥ | idantu ‘tribhiryajamānaṃ pāvayati’ iti vacanena dṛṣṭārthatve 'pi mantrāṇāṃ samuccayāvagateryājñikācārasatvācca praụdhīvādamātraṃ vijñeyam |kuto vaivamādīnāṃ saṃkhyāyuktāvidhānādante samuccayaḥ | sarveṣu viparivṛttibhaṅgāsaṃnidhiḥ saṃbhāvyeta na mantrāntareṣviti viśeṣaḥ ||

sarvābhyāsāntābhihitenācchidreṇetyādinā 'nanyagatikatvādyadā punātuśabdaḥ svīkṛtaḥ, tadā punātvacchidreṇetyevaṃ kalpite saṃbandhe ya evānantaraḥ punātuśabdaḥ sa eva pūrvayorapīti karaṇasaṃbandhapradarśanavelāyāmanveti | kriyāḥ padārthāḥ santastāmapekṣamāṇāḥ sakaraṇikāmevā ' 'sādayantīti sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ | evaṃ vā 'nuṣaṅgeṇa prayoktavye ye tantreṇa prayuñjate teṣāṃ tadālasyamātraṃ purastātparastādvā vākyaśeṣasyānuṣaṅgatvāviśeṣe sati yatpurastādanuṣaṅge 'nvīyata iti kaiściducyate tadviśeṣaprasiddhimātramiti draṣṭavyam || 48 ||

‘saṃ te vāyurvātena gacchatām’ ityasya sākāṅkṣasyānantaratvādavadhāritaḥ śeṣo bahuvacanāntenāyogyenāsaṃbaddhastulyayogitvābhāvādyogyenāpi yajñapatinā nānuṣajyate | ataśca vaidikaśeṣāsaṃbhavādasti laukikasyāvakāśa ityubhayatrādhyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ | tatra tu yadyapi noccāryate gacchatāmiti tathā 'pyavaśyamanusaṃdhātavyaḥ, anyathā 'rthāparisamāpteḥ | tasmānnānuṣaṅga iti | prayojanaṃ tu, anuṣaṅge mantratvātprāyaścittam | laukikatve cāmantratvamiti | prayojanaviṣaye vṛddhasaṃmatiṃ darśayati—āha cetyādinā |āha ca—
